text: Vacker park. Missa in Monopteros. Observera att nakenbad är tillåtet i bäcken som rinner igenom parken.

title: Bellissima
text: Consiglio a tutti di andare all'Englisch Garten, al chinesisch Turm che si trova al centro.Interessante notare le gare di surf, vari surfisti si sfidano sia d'inverno che d'estate.

text: Le long de l’Isar, un poumon vert pour les Munichois qui s’y pressent pour prendre e soleil, se baigner ou faire du sport. Nous avons sillonné  le parc en vélo, des dizaines de klm de pistes cyclables. Impressionnant.

title: Perfect place for tourists and locals
text: I have been here thousands of time, drinking beer, training for the munich marathon and running through it. The southern side, especially around the Eisbach is perfect to chill out, the northern part is wilder and quieter, much better for working out! Love it!

title: Lustwandeln in München
text: Sehr schön zum spazieren gehen. Gemütlich und doch Zentral. Ein Bierchen im dortigen Biergarten darf natürlich auch nicht fehlen. Ich lebe diesen Park!

title: Lebt vom Renommee der guten alten Zeit, nicht mehr
text: Zuerst : was dort unter dem chinesischen Turm geboten wird ist einfach grottig. Zum abgewöhnen. Und hat absolut nichts mehr mit der Gastlichkeit zu tun, die man früher dort genießen konnte. Der Park als solcher gut gepflegt, groß, mit vielen Sitzmöglichkeiten ( ist nicht in allen Parks so ).  Aber nicht jeder Tourist kommt mit Surfbrett für die Eisbachwelle oder mit Stringtanga fürs publikumswirksame Plantschen .  So gesehen lebt der park sicher durch die Erinnerung an Film und fernsehen, hat aber de facto keine großen touristischen Reize.  Für einen Spaziergang ganz nett

title: Erfrischende Gaudi!

title: Parco stupendo
text: Frequentato moltissimo dai monacensi, è attraversato da un fiume, dove si può fare surf, si avete letto bene, fare il bagno eo farsi trasportare dalla corrente; si può prendere il sole, fare ginnastica o giocare praticamente a tutto, visto gli spazi enormi.Si può passeggiare o attraversarlo in bici lungo i molti percorsi. Non mancano comunque birra e salsicce in un ampio spazio dedicato, vicino all'edificio cinese.

title: Passeggiata
text: È un parco cittadino dove si può fare di tutto. Si può fare il bagno nel fiume, prendere il sole ( una zona è riservata ai nudisti) mangiare e bere in una birreria tipica all'aperto che può ospitare fino a 7000 persone, andare in bici, in monopattino,  in i pattini insomma tutto... persino fare surf!!!! Andateci di giorno

text: Sehr weitläufig,  gepflegt,  mit viel Wasser und großzügig angelegte Wege. Sehr angenehm,  ähnliches kenne ich nur aus dem Central Park.

title: It's English Garden 🤷

title: Die Sonne scheint, das Surfen geht auf
text: Es erstreckt sich über 90 Hektar üppige Parklandschaft im Herzen von München.  Es gibt nichts Schöneres, als einen sonnigen Tag in einem bezaubernden englischen Garten zu verbringen.Die nördliche Hälfte des Englischen Gartens ist eine grüne und ruhige Landschaft. Sie ist voller langem Gras und bietet Zugang zum nahe gelegenen Fluss Isar.  Das New Amphitheatre ist ein wunderbarer Ort für Ruhe und FriedenIn einer leichten Abweichung vom englischen Thema können sich sogar Surfer darin üben: Direkt neben dem Kunstmuseum Haus der Kunst testen erfahrene Surfer aus nah und fern ihr Durchhaltevermögen gegen die meterhohe stehende Welle, die durch die künstliche Flussmündung erzeugt wird  des Eisbachs.

title: HUGE!

title: Great for a bike ride
text: Rented a bike for a couple of hours and took a ride in this HUGE park. There are a number of things here, for one the American embassy, some historical buildings, which I unfortunately did not have a lot of time to look at closely, a lot of nice little paths full of dogs, joggers and families, a river that had some people surfing and a lot of really interesting duck types. Only thing that could have made it better is warmer weather, but I guess cold weather is to be expected in February...

title: Great Place to relax

title: Best place for a sunny day
text: Plenty of options here. Surf the Eisbach wave. Float in the Eisbach for a while and then walk back or take the subway back. Relax on a blanket next to the river. Nice walk through the park. Some food options as well. Always a guy with a bicycle selling beer out of his trailor.

text: Wir waren jetzt 4 Monate zu Hause und genossen den Spaziergang im englischen Garten und den Besuch am chinesischen Turm.Da wir nicht mehr ganz knusprig sind, hatten einige Schwierigkeiten, daß wir zu der Gastronomie Gelagen konnten.Für viele Besucher ist das Einchecken mit Smartphone App oder an der anderen Seite des Gartens das schriftliche Anmelden schon gewohnheitsbedürftig. Der Tisch wird einem an Hand einer nummerierten Karte zugewiesen.Wir haben es gerne gemacht, aber wie gesagt, wenn man nicht mehr jung ist, ist es stressig.Trotzdem möchten wir nicht meckern, denn wenn wir das Personal sehen, welches den ganzen Tag mit derMaske arbeiten müssen geht es uns gut!

title: Ein bisschen Natur in der Großstadt!
text: Bei unserem Münchentripp dürfte ein Besuch im Englischen Garten natürlich nicht fehlen. Es ist ein sehr weitläufiger Park und wir haben uns grade mal einen kleinen Teil angesehen. Wir waren am Chinesischen Turm. Der dort sehr bekannte große Biergarten sieht mit vielen Absperrungen (durch Corona ist nur ein kleiner Teil geöffnet) leider etwas traurig aus. Wir haben natürlich auch die Eisbachwelle besucht um den Surfern zuzusehen. Für ein bisschen Erholung für die Münchener selbst ist der Park wahrscheinlich gut geeignet. Als besonderes Highlight würde ich ihn nicht bezeichnen. Aber irgendwie doch ein Must-See beim Münchentripp.

title: Beautiful gem in Munich!
text: This is a great place to visit after you have had your fill of tours. Rent a bike to make the most of all that the park has to offer.  You can find a lake with beautiful outdoor restaurants or quaint little beer gardens within the park.  Look for the mini Hofbrauhaus Beer garden and grab a quick lunch and beer while visiting with the local that like to stop here as well.  This is a great escape for some relaxation.

title: Beautiful gardens
text: We explored these gardens on our final day visiting Munich. What a beautiful area, it was so lovely to walk around and there was plenty to explore as well.You could easily spent all day there if the weather was good enough.We walked from near the train station and it took about 40 minutesThe beer garden which is in the gardens was also great, a huge space with tables and benches in lovely surroundings where you can have food and drink.Would recommend a visit

title: Ein Platz zum Erholen - auch zum Sport treien
text: Im englischen Garten kann man zu jeder Zeit baumeln, sporteln, liegen, kuscheln oder Leute treffen. Eine Oase wie sie es in keiner Stadt der Welt gibt.

title: Sehr schön

text: Parco bellissimo in pieno stile inglese.Ampio e con alcuni punti ristoro al suo interno.e attraversato da alcuni ruscelli che creano anche piccole cascate.sicuramente da vedere.

title: Natural paradise deep in the city
text: The English Garden is like an onion with many layers to explore. We started our adventure from the side that meets up with the Hilton Múnich Park hotel and thought it was simply tree lined trails to walk but wow were we wrong! We came across a beer garden that served tasty food cafeteria style. After enjoying dinner and beer we continued our walk and came up on people surfing in the canal that runs through the Gardens. Once we reached the other side (leading into the historic section of the city) we found miles of green spaces and many people walking their dogs. It is definitely worth a visit when in town. We could’ve spent several days in town and still wouldn’t have seen all the water features, trails, restaurants or green spaces to explore.
visit: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

title: Очень интересный и большой...
text: Точнее будет слово парк чем сад. Мы были вчетвером - младшая внучка в коляске😉. Начали с Айсбаха. Завораживает! За время отпуска мы трижды приходили смотреть на серферов ( много девушек и даже дети катаются). Вроде небольшой участок, но такое сильное течение!!! Место популярное - зрителей всегда было под 50 человек. Нудистский район парка был безлюден🙃, как и японский садик. А вот у Китайской башни жизнь кипит. Столиков свободных предостаточно, но выбирали мы долго. Был ветер и каштаны бомбардировали постоянно. Спаслись под ёлками. Рулька, картофель, штрудель, кофе, пиво все из ближайшего кафе. Вкусно и недорого. Пополнили силы и дальше гулять. По парку ездят велосипедные групповые туристы с гидом. Много людей бегают трусцой👍. Выходили из сада на Леопольдштрассе. Как же повезло жителям ближайших домов иметь рядом такой парк!

title: Suis-je vraiment en centre-ville? Calme et repos
text: Jardin indescriptible.De la verdure, des arbres, de l’espace, des gens, pas de bruit alors que nous sommes quasiment dans le centre-ville.Personne ne juge personne.Lieu calme où chacun respecte son voisin.Pour finir un biergarten pour ne pas oublier que vous êtes en Allemagne.Topissime

title: El corazón de Múnich
text: Coger una bici, una cesta de pícnic y tomarse una cerveza en el Biergarten de la Torre China para después ver surfear, es vivir Múnich.
visit: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

title: Great open area
text: Not currently at best due to cleaning g up work going on at 'pond' but should be finished in a few weeks time.Music as usual at beer garden at Chinese Tower weather permitting and surfers about as usual but hardly any geese

title: ... great to visit all year round!
text: Going in winter for a mulled wine at the pagoda, or in summer for a civilized cup of german coffe and cake, its always a treat at the english garden. Personally, i like the proximity of the old vet school and the riding area - and one day I will swim in the 'Eisbach' - but only with at least 3 mm of neoprene and a floating device on me:).

title: Local bem tranquilo
text: O Jardim Inglês é um espaço enorme, com cerca de 4 km, muito tranquilo. Aqui pratica-se surf (Eisbach) e do Monoptero é possível observar o centro da cidade.

title: Stupendo!!!
text: Stupendo e bellissimo parco gigante con la possibilità di fare attività sportive o tranquille passeggiate e rilassarsi. Alla “fine” della lunga camminata si arriva alla PAGODA cinese della HB, dove rifocillarsi con stinco e birra!!! Vi consiglio una visita!!!!!

title: Immer wieder schön
text: Es gibt so viele schöne Ecken, vor allem im nördlichen Teil der lange nicht so überlaufen ist. Hier kann man sich mit Freunden auf ein gemeinsames Picknick verabreden,sich mit einer Decke zum Sonnenbaden auf die Wiese legen und den herrlichen Baumbestand genießen.

title: Most beautiful inner city park I have ever seen
text: There is everything, much green 🌴🌳🌳, water🌊🌊, silence🙏🏼, monuments🏯🏰🗿and the most impressive static surfer’s wave on the planet 💥💥🌊🧜🏼‍♀️🏄🏼‍♀️🏄🏻‍♂️

title: Photo session in English Garden
text: Super nice green areas, Family friendly with play yards, beer gardens, creeks and small waterfalls. Possible horse carriage, bike, on foot. Visit the Chinese tower and the surfers at Eisbach!

title: Ruhe oder Biergarten?
text: Der Park ist riesengroß. Er ist getrennt in einen Süd- und Nordteil.Im Süden sind viele Leute zur Erholung da. Der Chinesische Turm und der Monopteros befinden sich hier.Der Nordteil ist durch den Mittleren Ring (Hauptstraße) abgetrennt.Über eine Brücke am Kleinhesseloher See kommt man auf die andere Seite.Hier öffnet sich eine weite Landschaft und kam viel Natur und Ruhe genießen.

title: Bellísimo
text: Molto Bello. Qualcosa du particolare Bella cittá du Monaco du Baviera. Bello in fiumiciattolo, in cane si e divertido moltissimo.

title: Super
text: Einfach nur entspannt im Sommer und auch zum Winterspaziergang gut! Super sauber und sicher Tolle Stimmung

title: Ein Spaziergang lohnt eigentlich immer
text: Ein Besuch in München ohne auch in den Englischen Garten zu gehen, ist für mich fast unvorstellbar. Es gehört einfach dazu und ist meistens eine schöne Gelegenheit zur Muße.

title: The best place to be when the Summer arrives
text: Every weekend that is sunny in the summer I come here at least once. I recommend to bring some food and beverages and a good book.

title: Great place to walk around and chill out.
text: Beautiful park, great area to unwind and take a stroll.Has a great little lake in the middle of the park.

title: Perfect way to enjoy at beautiful day!
text: My husband and I enjoyed a lovely lunch at the English Garden on a beautiful sunny September afternoon.  The place was busy, but we got our food quickly and it was pretty good.  Prices were OK, too.

title: Worth checking out
text: We really enjoyed walking through the gardens it was quite beautiful and pleasant to walk through and different beautiful scenery along the way
visit: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

title: Jardín muy grande donde los munigenses van a pasear
text: El jardín ingles es un pulmón de Munich donde se va a pasear, hacer deporte, ir con la familia.Aquí se encuentra la famosa ola donde los surferos van a hacer surf sorteando una ola de un metro de altura.Al lado de la ola vimos el primer edificio de propaganda del tercer reich llamado:Haus der KunstMuy agradable un paseo por sus jardines y lagos.Hay patos, ardillas, cuervos.Imagino que en verano estará muy animado.

title: Beautiful
text: A huge green space in the middle of a crowded city. I wish I had more time to walk all along it and enjoy the open space and the nature. The river surfers are a plus, quite entertaining. Totally worth it.

title: Natura e Benessere
text: Bellissima giornata di relax e benessere qui al giardino inglese di Monaco ...... fino a che continuerà a chiamarsi così 😜. In una tiepida giornata di sole con la mia dolce metà
visit: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

title: Extraordinario
text: Jardín en el centro de Múnich. Sitio relajado a disfrutar con buen tiempo. En el centro está la pagoda donde se ofrece música bávara en vivo. Esta la cervecería HB con su chiringuito para comer al aire libre. Recomiendo
visit: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

title: のんびりと
text: とても広い公園で、のんびりするにはちょうどいいです。９月は少し肌寒かったです。川でサーフィンができることで有名です。
visit: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

title: Englischer Garten
text: Lindo e gigante jardim/parque no meio de Munique. Várias opções ao ar livre e estruturas , além de um Biergarten da HB

title: Kult
text: Spise og drikkested i parken. Fin pek utenom det og såklart, besøk dette stedet på en solrik dag så blir du fornøyd.

title: Green lung in the heart of Munich
text: A huge park in the center of Munich, a wonderful place to stroll on clear and not too cold days. On hot days you can sunbathe and even swim in the small lakes in the park.

title: Muy típico y recomendable
text: Si el tiempo te da tregua es una visita muy recomendable. Es una jardín/parque muy amplio, pero tiene zonas muy interesantes: la ola donde van a surfear los muniquianos, la zona nudista o la casa china con varios puestos de comida y cerveza al lado, donde podrás disfrutar de un ambiente típico de alli y muy bueno

title: El Pulmón de Múnich !!!
text: Aquí nos encontramos el pulmón de Múnich, un lugar similar a Central Park !!. Se veían gran cantidad de personas practicando deportes de todo tipo. Se pueden hacer fotos muy chulas al atardecer.

title: Eine Grün Lunge der Stadt
text: Ein des bekanntesten Parks Deutschland und sehr ansprechend mit Grün, Bäume und viele Plätze bei Biergärten.Eine sehr schöne grüne Anlage, nach dem Vorbild von klassischen englischen Landschaftsgärten.
visit: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

title: Место для прогулок
text: Находится недалеко от центра - пешком минут десять. Огромный парк с ручьём, водопадами, мостиками и полянами. По парку гуляют огромные гуси и утки. Есть китайская башня и античная беседка.

title: Espectacular
text: Lugar que enamora, una extensión preciosa con un rio que lo cruza. En plenoCentro te traladas a la tranquilidad de un bosque. Vale la pena dar un paseo.

text: Se andate a Monaco, anche in pieno inverno, non potete non trascorrere qualche ora nel Giardino inglese. Un vero e proprio polmone verde. Una bella passeggiata, una birra e via. title: Magical Munich
text: Munich is a magical place and I would recommend every visitor goes to the English Garden On a sunny winters day it’s magical
visit: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

title: A walk on the cold side.
text: Generally referred to as Munich’s green lung this is a peaceful place to spend a couple of hours. Most people tend to gravitate to the Chinese Tower and even on the day we visited with the temperature barely above freezing there were plenty of people sat outside enjoying a beer or gluhwein. However if you are entering the park from the corner of Prinzregenten and Lerchenfeld Strasse there is a lovely little cafe which seems to be in a converted public convenience. Don’t be put off it is very popular with local office workers and has a welcoming atmosphere and log fire. Ideal on a cold day. One of the more bizarre sights was a young man surfing downstream of a weir on the Eisbach. Keep a lookout for Red Squirrels.
visit: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

title: Great Park!
text: Great location in the heart of Munich. Plenty of things to discover like the pagoda and the Biergarten! You might Even find surfers !

title: A treasure in the heart of Munich
text: Walking through this park is an absolute delight. In nice weather (we had nice weather in February), it's packed full of people running, biking, eating, drinking and just generally lounging. Plus they have surfing in the river. One of the highlights of our time in Munich.

title: Amazing Park
text: Do not miss the English Garden!!!  It is a great place to enjoy a stroll.  We were lucky to have the leaves changing in the fall which only added to the experience - lucky us.Many people come to run, walk, play soccer and just enjoy the area.  There are rentals at the lake for paddle boats.  There are restaurants, restrooms and a bier garden within the park.To give perspective, this park is larger than Central Park in NYC.  So make sure you take the time to experience it all!

title: River surfing, ducks and more
text: Such a lovely walk on a mild winter afternoon in the green lungs of Munchen! We walked along the river and chanced on the river surfers having a fine time though I’m sure the water was cold!Very relaxing and beautiful walk!

title: Englischer Garten München
text: Når du er i München må du besøke Englischer Garten - en oase midt i hjertet av vakre München. Her kan du gå turer, i sommerhalvåret ta med liggeunderlag så kan du slappe av og sole deg, og så avslutte med ein Mass Bier eller Radler pluss eine Brezel am Chinesischen Turm. Viel Spass!

title: Beautiful!
text: We had a leisurely stroll through the garden in the afternoon. We saw the surfers and lots of locals that were exercising and walking dogs. They take their dog training seriously in Europe! Most dogs were off leash and well behaved. The park is a beautiful way to experience local culture and get a breath of fresh air.
visit: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

title: Besser als der Central Park in NY
text: Mitten in der Stadt ein großer Park mit gemütlichen Biergärten. Geheimtip: Kiosk Tivoli, meist auch im Winter geöffnet

title: wunderschön :)
text: sehr schöner und weitläufiger Park mit Liege- und Hundewiesen, Eisbach, Monopteros und super Biergarten mit Blasmusik für Alt und Jung

title: Spaziergänger in München
text: In den 70´er Jahren, als noch kaum jemand ein handy hatte, liess man, an heissen Tagen, das Telefon im Büro von einem office-boy besetzen, der wichtige Nachrichten per Radel zu uns in dem Biergarten am Chinesischen Turm, unter der Linde 07 übermittelte.So war man, auch nach einer oder zwei Mass Bier, abgekühlt und ohne Telefonklingeln, voll auf dem Laufenden und konnte die frische Luft vom Englischen Garten geniessen

title: Grüne Lunge
text: Hier kann man(n) /  auch Frau :-)  gaaaaaanz genüsslich chillen - entspannen - sonnen - relaxen - sporteln....🧡 - was willst Du mehr.....

title: Sommer, Biergarten....
text: Toller Garten in München. Im Sommer extrem viel los, aber sehr schön. Im Biergarten sitzen und auf den See schauen...

title: Большой городской парк
text: Прекрасный парк, есть речка, на которой серфят серфингисты, есть где погулять. Напоминает знаменитый парк в НЙ на Манхэттене. Очень рекомендую взять велосипед напрокат, как это сделал я. Так намного быстрее и легче осмотреть весь парк. Ничего сверхоригинального в нем нет, но очень приятное место в большом городе. Довольно интересная архитектура райончиков вокруг парка. Но опять же, это все отлично осваивать на велосипеде.

title: Excellent park to get out of the apartment, hotel or house.
text: This is a park in Munich where you can easily and quickly get out to sun tan, picnic, run, cycle, walk, play soccer, or even some cricket. You can meet people or just sit on your own and enjoy the outdoors. Lots of space where you can be relatively alone or be close to people.

title: Excelente Experiencia ao ar livre
text: Um ótimo local para piquenique e curtir um fim de tarde. Aproveitar para fazer atividades ao ar livre em Munique é uma ótima pedida.

title: Huge Garden
text: This is quite a large garden and you can watch river surfing!  The scenery is beautiful.  We were there when the leaves were changing and the colors were spectacular!  It’s a nice break from the city.

title: A really chil place in the heart of the city
text: You must visit the English Garden if you want to experience the relaxed atmosphere of a park, where people hang out, take a break or jog along. The beer garden in the center of the English Garden is a more touristy place.

title: Glorious way to spend the day.
text: Start at the Japanese Tea House, stop to watch the surfers! So very cool! Then continue on to the Bier Garten. Even off season there is food and drink. I did walk all the way up to the Kneipe (pub), around the lake then back to the University subway stop. So much to see; beautiful gardens, lovely trails and fields to enjoy. Bring a picnic! I will definitely walk to park again next visit

title: Wow - great stroll
text: Such a lovely place for a stroll. Lots of peopleOut walking, running and taking their pets out for an outing. Certainly worth a wonder, even in the winter.

title: Nice and peaceful
text: Only a few minutes walk from the busy streets, The English Garden is great for those wanting to escape the busy lifestyle. Here you can enjoy walking, swimming and many other sports however please do be warned in the summer months people tend to shed their clothes. Yes naked, butt naked.

title: Sous la pluie!
text: Nous avons traversé ce jardin sous la pluie et en hiver, ce n'était pas la bonne période pour apprécier ce lieu!

title: Bem bacana mesmo no inverno
text: Dei uma volta pelo local depois de passar por Marienplatz. É um típico parque: com pista de corrida (de areia), muito verde com árvores ao redor e um lago (pequeno) onde algumas pessoas brincavam com seus cachorros e uns patos. o espaço é bem grande e deve ser um ponto de encontro no verão. Para um dia muito frio de dezembro o lugar estava com bastante gente.

title: Schöner Garten im Frühling und Sommer
text: Für Natur Liebhaber ein schöner Park zum spazieren gehen oder auch joggen und sonstige Dinge. Für Wasserverrückte sportlich Menschen auch ein  muss weil man Dort Wellen reiten kann.

title: Nice to walk.
text: If have spare time and want to have a walk, English gardeni is a very good choise. Easy to reach via U-Bahn. Long walk paths, beauitiful  trees, tweeting birds.. What else will you need to relax ?

title: Pulmon de Munich
text: Jardin extenso, verdadero pulmon de Munich es como estar en el campo.Cascadas, animales, bosque frondoso recorrido por caminos. Se respira tranquilidad.
visit: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

title: Прекрасный сад
text: На майских праздниках были в Мюнхене и гуляя по городу зашли в  английский сад. Я пожелаю всем городам иметь такие парки! Он огромный, при этом очень ухоженный и живописный. Выгул животных запрещен, поэтому все посетители свободно лежат на траве, играют с детьми, устраивают пикники. По всей территории парка протекает речка. Молодые люди занимаются серфингом. В глубине парка есть огромное кафе, где за приемлемые деньги можно пообедать. Чудесное место, будете в Мюнхене обязательно выделите время просто погулять!

title: A beautiful and peaceful garden to wander
text: Full of different areas to experience and sights to behold, the English Garden is free to visit and a must see when in Munich; p.s. make sure to take in the nearby Hofgarten whilst in the city.

title: Sehr schön
text: Im Februar vielleicht nicht die erste Adresse,  aber ein toller Park und schön angelegt und ein Ruheplatz mitten in der Stadt!

title: Winter in the gardens
text: Great place to spend some time away from the city. It is an easy walk. Just a little disappointed as a number of attractions were closed for the winter and renovations. May just be a better place to visit in Summer.

title: Excelente parque urbano
text: É um parque enorme e muito lindo, com perfeitas paisagens europeias. Sugiro conhecer o Monopteros, uma construção no alto com inspiração clássica, a torre chinesa, percorrer as trilhas ao lado do rio Eisbach, ver o pessoal surfando. Muito bacana.Achei bem seguro e tranquilo andar por lá.

title: Nature et liberté
text: Tellement enchantés par cet endroit unique au monde que nous sommes retournés en Septembre . Au programme détente baignade naturisme liberté . Toujours incroyable de pouvoir être nus sans stress dans ce grand parc nature..... Aucun regard aucune réflexion impensable en France!
visit: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

title: Nice walk through the park, with good views of the city.
text: Walked through part of this enormous park when on a long weekend. The grounds are well maintained, with a few stalls in the center for food and beer. Also had a dome in the centre with a great viewpoint of the city. Had a mixture of people chiling out and using the park. Also has a manmade river, where people were surfing, which made for a good watch. Highly recommend a stroll through.

title: Ein riesiger Park mit vielen Möglichkeiten
text: Der Englische Garten ist ein riesiger Park der sich vom Haus der Kunst bis in den Norden Münchens erstreckt. Sehr bekannt ist die Surfwelle am Eisbahn gleich hinter dem Haus der Kunst.Hier gibt es auch ein japanisches Teehaus. Von dort kann man zum Monopterus gehen und weiter zum Chinesischen Turm. Hier stehen Kutscher für Fahrten durch den Englischen Garten bereit und die Kinder können mit einem über 100 Jahre alten Karrussel fahren. Im Sommer kann man hier im Biergarten sitzen und im Advent findet man rund um den Turm einen sehr schönen Weihnachtmarkt. Ein Stück weiter kommt der Kleinhesseloher See mit dem Seehaus einem schönen Restaurant mit Biergarten. Ein Kahnverleih ist auch da. Außerdem gibt es Reitwege und Radwege im englischen Garten. Für jeden ist etwas dabei. Mit seinen 375 Hektar ist der Englische Garten der größte Park der Welt.

title: Paraíso de una gran ciudad.
text: Este jardín es un rincón Imprescindible de visitar en esta bella ciudad. Dar un paseo por el, ver su ríos , lago y tomar una cerveza en alguno de sus Biergarden son una pieza clave del turismo de Munich. Más de 400 Hectáreas para recorrer en la que podréis ver  un pagoda china de 35m o un salón de té japonés  así como un templo de estilo griego en sus más de 75km de caminos diferentes.  Muy cerca del centro podrás pasar una Mañana o tarde genial. Recomendable 100%

title: Maravilhoso
text: Vale a pena a visita. Mas o parque é  bem grande, então vá com tempo e vontade de andar para explorar todos os cantos do parque. Vale a pena.

title: In mezzo al verde
text: Facilmente raggiungibile dietro al residenz Munich, il giardino inglese si estende per un bel po' di chilometri. Vi consiglio magari di andarci di domenica da poter ammirare il panorama. All interno troverete un laghetto con con anatre e papere e poi avanti il monopteros. A proseguire il ristorante bavarese /cinese con la struttura eretta per le olimpiadi. Il parco manca di indicazioni ma per il resto è un bel posto. Presumo in estate ancor meglio.
visit: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

title: κυριακάτηκη βόλτα
text: Μια βόλτα στους αγγλικούς κήπους αξίζει να την κάνετε...κόσμος που τρέχει,που βολτάρει,λίμνες με πάπιες,καθαρός αέρας διπλα στην πόλη!

title: Prepara la tabla de surf y el picnic
text: Emblematico parque de la zona bávara donde podres realizar multitud de deportes o tomar una cerveza en alguno de sus bonitos Biergarten. En la epoca que yo lo visite hacia bastante frío por lo que no invitaba mucho a hacer un picnic o tomar una cerveza al aire libre, pero muchos de mis amigos me comentan que en la epoca de verano es muy facil ver a familias enteras hacer picnics en sus grandes zonas verdes y practicar deportes al aire libre.En el interior del parque existen diferentes puntos de obligada visita, la casa del té china, su pagoda japonesa o un templo de estilo griego.Dentro del propio parque existe un canal artificial llamado Eisbach (arroyo helado) donde los aficionados al surf disfrutan de unas pequeñas olas en las epocas de calor, si eres aficionado a este deporte os recomiendo que os lleveis la tabla para quitaros el gusanillo.Para mi lo mejor que tiene este parque son los diferentes Biergarten que existen para relajarte tomando unas buenas cervezas alemanas y disfrutar de algun rayo de sol.

title: Get away from the City
text: This is a really lovely space in the middle of the city.Withing minutes you feel like you’re in the middle of the countryside.It’s a great place to get away from the noise of the city for a few minutes.If you’re lucky, you may even see the surfers, yes surfers on the river.

title: Beautiful Green space in Munich
text: This is a lovely park to walk around and soak in the flowers, streams and waterfalls. It's a perfect place to relax and get away from the busy urban area.

title: Grosser sehr schöner Park
text: Im Englischen Garten gibt es sehr gute möglichkeiten zum sich abzukühlen innerlich wie äusserlich. Er ist sehr gross und man kann zu Fuss oder mit dem Fahrrad weite Strecken zurücklegen

title: schöner park zum entspannen
text: Hier kann man gut spazieren gehen sich ausruhen und Energie tanken. Der englische Garten ist riesig und bekannt für seine Eisbachwelle, den chinesischen Turm und viele weitere Sehenswürdigkeiten

title: Like Central Park in NY
text: Amazing recreational park in the middle of the town. Close to university and central museums.Went for an early morning run. Felt save the whole time.

title: Christmas Market
text: We visited with friends who had never been to Munich for the Christmas Markets. We have been here many times in the summer but it was a few years since we had been to the Chinesischen Turm Christmas Market and we were not disappointed. The stalls surround the tower and offer a wide range of home made decorations, jewellery and clothing. There is a hut that offers craft making for children and another with story telling for younger children. The food is superb, particularly the pulled ox sandwich. You can rake horse and carriage rides through the park from here

title: Nice and relaxing, easy to access
text: We walked to the Garten from Marienplatz, with the idea to visit the Chinesischer Turm on the other side. It wasn't the best time to visit a park - end of December, temperature near to freezing, rain and wind - but we made the best of it. It was still a lovely visit. There's a river that runs through the greenery, a couple cute pedestrian bridges, lots of walking paths, and the Monopteros in the center of it all.Despite the cold and the rain, we spent a good amount of time in the park. We made a beeline for the Chinese Market, but on our way out, we strolled the paths, visited the Monopteros, took a ton of pictures and took our time leaving.It's tucked behind a quaint neighborhood, with a few small cafes and shops lining the streets on the way in. They also have a fun Biergarten on the way in, with a couple of old ski buggies (is that the right term for it?) offering shelter from the weather.I'd love to go back in another season, to be able to enjoy everything the park has to offer in heat and sunshine.

title: Schöner Christkindlmarkt
text: Der Christkindlmarkt beim Chinesischen Turm ist wirklich einen kleinen Ausflug wert. Nicht überlaufen, gutes Essen und Trinken. Die Angebote sind bodenständig. Einfach nett.

title: A Quiet Refuge
text: Munich is a large and crowded city, especially around Christmas and this is a wonderful place to get away from it all and relax.  We went to the Christkindlmarkt there, walked around a bit and really enjoyed being there.

title: A must when in Munich
text: We went here for the day. We were lucky as the weather was stunning. We found a nice table to sit at. There was a band playing and we didn’t have to queue for a drink or food. It was a great atmosphere all round. This was in the beer Garten there. You can freely walk around the gardens and take in the views and culture. We will go back for sure.

title: 一個很大的花園
text: 就在瑪利亞廣場前一個站，一出來就可以看到英式庭園。是一個好大的公園。可以在庭園內散步，野餐和拍照。附近有慕尼黑皇宮等景點

title: Парк.
text: Место для не спешных пеших прогулок по дорожкам из мелкого гравия и сидения на лавочках. Просто парк.

text: A wonderful place to wander and relax or alternatively to some white ware boarding on the river. Great for cafe and drinks/food

text: Zu jeder Jahreszeit schön. Und das Beobachten der Surfer einmalig. Zudem gibt's selbst im Winter etwas zu beissen und trinken. Der Punsch war sehr lecker.

title: Great Views
text: Great views in Summer (previous trip).. not as scenic in Winter months but still a good walk around and fresh air

title: Vastissimo parco nel centro di Monaco
text: Benchè mi sia recato a Monaco in Dicembre è stato piacevolissimo (complici il bel tempo e la temperatura non gelida) passeggiare per una parte di questo vastissimo parco che si trova a poca distanza dal centro di Monaco di Baviera.Consiglio di recarsi almeno fino al Monopteros (tempietto neoclassico in stile greco a pianta circolare) da cui si gode una bella vista sul parco e sulla città.

title: Хорошее место для прогулки
text: Гуляли 1-го января. Прекрасная погода. Большое пространство для пешеходной прогулки после обильной еды на Новый год. Есть места где можно перекусить, попить, выпить. Правда дороговато - бутылка воды пол-литра обошлась в 3,5 евро.

title: Beautiful place for 365 days a year
text: Quick walk or favourite jogging path- English Garden is my favourite place in the whole Munich . Especially catching sunsets.

title: Incommensurabile
text: Abbiamo visitato questo parco soltanto in parte perchè è davvero immenso e necessiterebbe almeno un giorno per essere girato totalmente. Suggestiva la pagoda cinese e soprattutto lo spettacolo dei surfisti vicino al ponte. Unico.

title: Beautiful gardens!!
text: Huge, majestic and not much to see in the winter, but this is worth a walk through. If it is a sunny day, bring some pretzels and sit in a bench to enjoy the amazing surroundings.

title: A Must!
text: I have done the English Garden in August, October, and December, and I have loved it every time! The Chinese tower and accompanying beir garden (or Christmas Market depending when you go) is such a wonderful experience)

title: schöner Ort zum Chillen
text: ich bin immer wieder gern hier, irgendjemand macht Musik, Biergarten, oder einfach nur chillen mit Freunden

title: Great place to relax, unwind...or exercise
text: Been to Munich a few times and always like to stay near the English Garden - it is a great place to go for an early morning run. You can make the distance as long or short as possible and visit some of the sites within the garden along the way.

title: Wonderful for walking any time of the year,
text: We have visited at many times of the year. Particularly good during the Christmas Market time and in the summer months.

title: Meraviglia in città
text: Il giardino inglese è stata una bella scoperta,un bel polmone verde a due passi dal centro città! Posto adatto a tutti per qualsiasi tipo di movimento,per rilassarsi e staccare un po' la spina.
visit: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

title: A lovely park, perfect on a nice day
text: The park is much bigger than I expeced, and you cannot drive the e-scooters inside, so either prepare for a lot of walking, or rent a bike.There are many different areas inside, from rivers to dense forests, open plains, restaurants, beer gardens, we even seen snakes.Perfect place to go on a nice summers' day.

title: Paseo muy agradable
text: El jardín inglés es como una burbuja dentro de Munich, doonde los locales y los turistas pasean, juegan o descansan en la pagoda china bebiendo buena cerveza

title: Amazing
text: Visitato in minima parte dato il freddo bestiale però è uno dei più grandi parchi cittadini del mondo.Da vedere la Chinesisher Turn che ospita uno dei più grandi Biergarten della città,o il Monopteros un tempio in Greek style.

title: Zu jeder Jahreszeit ein Besuch wert
text: Einer der schönsten Plätze Münchens. Spaziergang durch den Englischen Garten ist zu jeder Jahreszeit wunderschön. Eisbach, Monopteros, Chinesischer Turm, Seehaus am Kleinhesseloher See, aber auch den ursprünglichen Nordteil  mit Aumeister und Schwammerlweiher nicht vergessen. Traumhaft

text: Stupendo parco nel cuore di Monaco, uno dei parchi più grandi nella città. All'interno vi sono anche dei  stand dove si può bere una ottima birra oppure una specialità bavarese.

title: Impressive
text: It's unbelievable that this HUGE park is inside the city. Highly recommend spending an afternoon there just chilling.

title: Belle balade.
text: Ce parc est d’un calme et d’une grandeur impressionnante.Une après midi en balade dans cet endroit est très agréable, surtout avec des enfants.Il s’agit d’un véritable poumon vert et on oubli très vite la proximité de la ville.

title: Obligatoire
text: Faire une ballade dans le jardin, écouter de la musique bavaroise depuis l’orchestre de la pagode située au centre du jardin est un immanquable. S’il fait beau on peut manger et boire sur place en plein air. Des petits pavillons au pied de la pagode vendent des plats et des bocks de bière.

text: В парке особо нечего делать.Можно конечно погулять, посмотреть на собак, посидеть на лавочке.Но, мой совет, посмотреть как там ребята катаются на сёрфах) ну и сделать классные фоточки для инстаграмма.

title: Ruhe Oase mitten in der Stadt
text: Ruhe Oase mitten in der Stadt. Hier kann  man einen halben Tag spazieren gehen oder sich einfach nur faul auf eine Wiese legen und relaxen. Sehr interessant auch den Surfern an der stehenden Welle zu zuschauen.

text: Я люблю прогуливаться по паркам, наслаждаясь красотой ухоженной природы.Английский сад очень большой и красивый. К сожалению, когда мы его посещали, там было очень людно и достаточно шумно.

text: Giardino immenso ma adatto più che altro per attività sportive. Ci sono 2/3 punti di interesse che bon faranno spalancare la bocca. Non utile visitarlo.

text: Parque localizado no centro da cidade, muito grande. Permite até surfar! Vários caminhos demarcados, bom para um bom passeio.

title: Bem no meio da cidade
text: O parque é enorme (maior que o Central Park!) e fica bem no meio da cidade. Tem surf no rio Issar, até mesmo no inverno! Ótimo lugar para passear, descansar ou ler um livro. Infelizmente não tive muito tempo para explorá-lo, ainda assim ficou uma ótima impressão.

title: Passeggiata a Monaco
text: Sinceramente mi aspettavo qualcosa di più, parco grande ma non troppo curato, ci si può passeggiare andare in bici o correre ma niente più. Da migliorare l intrattenimento per i più piccini. Per trascorrere un paio di ore nel verde e nella tranquillità è l ideale.

title: Bello ma...
text: Il giardino è enorme, ci sono tantissimi spazi verdi. Ci sono anche dei torrenti che scorrono al suo interno e, all'inizio del parco, dal lato di Marienplatz, ci sono addirittura degli impavidi surfisti che cavalcano le onde di uno di questi torrenti. Ci sono diverse aree recintate dove i bambini possono giocare con scivoli e altalene. Sono rimasto un po' deluso quando sono arrivato più o meno al centro del parco, dove doveva trovarsi un laghetto. La zona era tutta transennata, il laghetto quasi secco e poco curato. Vi erano diversi rami secchi a terra. Non so come mai non ci sia manutenzione in questa zona... peccato perché il parco è veramente bello

title: Nice garden very near the city
text: Very nice Garden which is just a few steps away from the city center. Certainly worth a visit if you be in Munich.

title: A forest in a city
text: The English Garden is a great place when you want to take a few relaxing breaths in the city. Even though we visited it during the winter it was great. Fresh air, nice walking paths.

title: Expansive Park in Munich
text: This was our second time in the English Garden - the first was Spring 2014 - and so we definitely observed the park in a different seasonal context. And while in truth it's nicer when the trees are in bloom and when more people are out (enjoying the warm weather), it was a still a nice chance for us to stroll through this large park, specifically to get to the Chinese Tower. Be sure to give a least a little thought to which walking path you want to go down, or else you may find yourself either backtracking or detouring over the grass to get where you want to go.

visit: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

title: Must See Munich Sanctuary
text: Love this park and all that it offers.  Beautiful open space with historic features and plenty of room to stretch your legs, take a siesta, decompress from a hectic travel schedule, or to catch a quick game of football.  A lovely Biergarten in the southern part and decorated for the holidays.  Easy a metro ride from Munich Hfb and worth a couple hours of your time if you’re weary of museums and other venues.  Pack a picnic and make it a a half-day respite!

title: Conversations with German students in the nude
text: My first time in Munich was a wonderful experience. While walking through and exploring these majestic gardens, about ten students approached me and asked where I was from. After I told them they asked me if I wanted to join them under a shade tree.  After we sat down they proceeded to undress to the buff and open a picnic lunch.  They offered to share their lunch with me and continue our discussion if I would join them by removing my clothing. Since the others were now nude, I decided to join them. It was extremely relaxing to talk with the students and have many discussions about our countries. It was apparent that these individuals are more open to body image. Back at the hotel, I discovered that the spa was also nude. Since it was my first time in Munich and experienced this novel lifestyle, I will surely return next year.

title: Pulmon verde

title: Meraviglioso
text: Bellissimo e curato parco che occupa un intero giorno per visitarlo tutto! visit: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

title: Vacker plats som jag återkommer till
text: Besöker Englischer Garten varje gång jag är i München, för en löprunda, en promenad eller en paus. En stor vacker park som korsas av en massa små klargröna vattendrag med vatten från Isar, stora gräsytor blandat med vackra trädpartier anlagda som "skog". Södra delen är den mest parklika och välbesökta, norra delen mer lik en skog och med mindre folk.Dom biergartens som ligger här är inte dom mest prisvärda och naturligtvis fulla med både turister och en del Münchenbor, men det kan ju vara trevligt det med.

title: A walk through the English Garden is always a pleasure at whatever time of year you visit
text: You can just do sections of this park, or walk the full length, with convenient U-Bahn stations dotted around to plan your journey. Also has little bars and cafes dotted around the park, for food and drink. A lovely large green park in the middle of this great city

title: Better and larger than Central Park
text: Munich's huge and unique public park is worth any step both in the crowded an cosy southern part and in the lovely landscape of the northern one.

title: Gigantesque
text: Enorme! malgré le froid et la grisaille, petite ballade dans ce parc immense. Meme si les marchés de Noel sont termines, il y a du monde qui se ballade. Vraiment un endroit calme t reposant. Cela doit être au top en été! A voir absolument

title: precioso
text: Despues de visitar la residencia nos paseamos por el, jardin ingles, es enorme y solamente estuvimos una hora, pero vale la pena

title: Ein Stückchen Paradies
text: Das Paradies muss in Bayern liegen - und der Englische Garten ist ein Stück davon. Man muss es nicht betonen: Ein Erholungsort erster Klasse, Super-Gastronomie (Chinesischer Turm, Seehaus, Biergarten am Seehaus), weitläufig mit vielen Wegen und Verweilplätzen - da muss eine andere Stadt ert einmal mithalten können. Heutzutage nicht mehr so ganz selbstverständlich in deutschen Städten: Keine Drogendealer, keine Kriminellen und die Polizei ist bei Belästigungen sehr schnell zur Stelle. Einfach ein wunderschöner und sicherer Ort im Herzen von München.

title: Surf no Rio
text: Um belíssimo parque cortado por um rio onde há um ponto para surf. Linda paisagem. Patos, corvos. No pagode chinês pode-se comer um bom prato ou sanduiche de salsicha r tomar uma cerveja, clara escura ou de trigo.

title: Sehr zu empfehlen
text: Der Garten/Park ist riesig und sehr schön. Im Sommer natürlich schöner. Man kann gut essen und trinken. Der Biergarten ist ein muss.Mit dem Auto oder per Bus erreichbar. Auch für Autos ohne grüne Etikette möglich.

title: Sehr viele Möglichkeiten

visit: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

title: Remanso de paz
text: Indudablemente sería un error estar en Munich y no disfrutar de este esplendoroso y grandioso jardín inglés, que te permite desconectarte y relajarte en un paseo y parada en él

title: Beautiful winter gardens

text: Wer in München das Gefühl von Landschaft braucht, sollte in den Englischen Garten gehen. Man kann ruhigere, aber auch belebte Plätze finden. Ganz nach Belieben.🌳🍁🍂🌼🌻

title: Magical Christkindlmarkt in the English Garden

text: This garden is easily accesible from old town and surely it would be very attractive to see it in spring or summer but didn't offer much in a cold and rainy day.

title: A place for all seasons
text: Wonderful - a place for all seasons. This park is so huge I believe it easily dwarves Central Park and Hyde Park. A short walk from the Museum district as well. Note to self to revisit in the spring.

title: Surprise Christmas Market
text: We went to see this Garden and thought that we would walk around the lake but the lake was empty for the winter.Our trip here improved when we found a Christmas Market. title: Beautiful even in winter

visit: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

title: Must do. Beautiful place in the middle of Munich
text: This is an absolutely fantastic place in Munich. It is a huge natural area in the middle of the city, where you can find calm and peace, and where you have fantastic views and fresh air. It is especially beautiful with snow in December!

title: Lovely park with a great beer garden inside

title: Gassi gehen mit Hund

title: Relajante

title: Green and peaceful

title: Pra passar o dia

text: تُعتبَر الحديقة الإنكليزية في ميونخ من أكبر الحدائق في العالم بمساحتها البالغة 375 هكتاراً، وفي أيام الصيف الدافئة يتدفق الناس إليها أسراباً وفرادى فمنهم الراكبون لدراجاتهم ومنهم الممارسون لرياضة العَدْو ومنهم المتمشون والمتنزهون، ومنهم الجالسون على بساط على المرج الأخضر وبجانبهم سلال من الطعام والشراب ومنهم مَن يلعبون بالكرات الطائرة ومضارب كرات الريشة. كما نرى عائلات وعربات للأطفال وكلاباً أليفة ومشروبات باردة وخبزاً قديماً لإطعام البط، وأناساً كثيرين مرتدين نظاراتهم الشمسية في هذا اليوم المشرق.مصمم الحديقة له نصب تذكاري في الحديقه وهو فريدريش لودفيغ فون سكيل الذي ينحدر من مدينة ميونخ وصمم الحديقة على نمط الحدائق الإنكليزية الشبيهة بالمناطق الريفية الجميلة، ومن هنا جاء اسم هذه الحديقة فسُمِّيَت بـ (الحديقة الإنكليزية)

title: Take your time.
text: The Englisher Garten (English Garden) in Munich is the largest city park in Europe.So if you want to visit the park including one of the restaurants and / or Biergartens, you need at least several hours.The most important sights in the park are a Chinese pagoda, a Japanese tea house, the Monopteros temple and also two Biergartens.The garden opened by the end of the 18th century.The name English Garden refers to the landscape style in which the garden is designed; it is a rather informal garden laid out in a style that was very popular in England during the late 18th and early 19th centuries.The park is larger than Central Park in New York and is divided into two sections: the Hirschau, the northern section is 3 kilometers long and the southern section is 2 kilometers long.The southern part is the busiest part of the park while the Hirschau is much quieter.

title: Η ομορφιά της Φύσης στην καρδιά της πόλης
text: Βρίσκεται στο κέντρο της πόλης του Μονάχου και ονομάστηκε αγγλικός κήπος γιατί ακολουθεί το αγγλικό πρότυπο, κατά το οποίο ο κήπος σχεδιάζεται έτσι ώστε να μιμείται τη φύση, σε αντίθεση με τον ιταλικό ή τον γαλλικό κήπο όπου κυριαρχούν τα γεωμετρικά σχέδια.Η κατασκευή του άρχισε το 1789, ως κήπου ανοικτού για όλους τους κατοίκους της πόλης σε πρώην ελώδη εδάφη. Σήμερα πρόκειται για έναν καταπληκτικό κήπο με γρασίδια, τεχνητές λίμνες, ποτάμια, πάπιες, δέντρα πανύψηλα και με χιλιάδες ανθρώπους κάθε ηλικίας να απολαμβάνουν τη φύση, να κάνουν πικνίκ, να κολυμπάνε, να κάνουν ηλιοθεραπεία, να τρέχουν, να πηγαίνουν βόλτα τα μωρά και τα σκυλάκια τους, ή να απολαμβάνουν την μπύρα τους ακούγοντας την μπάντα του δήμου να παίζει, σε μια ατμόσφαιρα χαράς και ξενοιασιάς. Στο πάρκο υπάρχουν ενδιαφέροντα παλιά κτίσματα όπως ο Μονόπτερος, ο κινεζικός Πύργος που μοιάζει με  την παγόδα στους κήπους του Λονδίνου και η οποία βρίσκεται στο χώρο μιας από τις υπαίθριες μπυραρίες του πάρκου. Επίσης αξίζει να ρίξετε μία ματιά και στην Ιαπωνική τσαγιέρα, όπου επιδεικνύεται η τέχνη της τελετής του τσαγιού.Εκείνο που δεν πρέπει να χάσετε είναι στο νότιο τμήμα του κήπου, στον ποταμό Eisbach, όπου επιδέξιοι σέρφερ προσπαθούν να  δαμάσουν κύματα ενός μέτρου, χειμώνα καλοκαίρι Ακόμη και με χιόνια. Το θέαμα είναι συναρπαστικό.Αν αγαπάτε τη φύση και έχετε χρόνο, αξίζει τον κόπο να τον επισκεφτείτε όταν έχει καλό καιρό.

title: Still beautiful on a blustery, October day

title: Imperdível!!

title: Münchner Central Park
text: Weitläufige Anlage, perfekt für einen ausgedehnten Spaziergang. Direkt zu Beginn wartet die Eisbach Welle, hier kann man bereits lange verweilen und den Surfern zusehen. Wirklich spektakulär Nach ner Weile noch vor dem chinesischen Turm kommt eine große Fläche wo jedermann sich bei sommerlichen Temperaturen abkühlen kann. Eigentlich verboten - wird aber geduldet. Die Polizei war zahlreich vertreten - zu Pferd und mit Auto.Aber Eisbach, der Name ist auch Programm. Hier trifft sich gefühlt ganz München zur Abkühlung und zum sonnen.In jedem Fall Badesachen einpacken.Wer keine eigene Brotzeit dabei hat. Am chinesischen Turm gibt's unter schattigen Bäumen, das übliche Münchner Programm. Blasmusik, Haxen, Weisswurst, Obazda & Co.Schön ist das historische Kinderkarussell mit über 100 Jahren auf dem Buckel.Im englischen Garten kann man getrost einen Tag verbringen und die Seele baumeln lassen. title: Un énorme parc, plus grand que le Central Park de New York

Il ne s’agit pas d’un parc botanique par contre, donc n’espérez pas d’avoir des explications sur les plantes ou des espèces d’arbres extravagants. À voir quand même et facilement combinable avec la Eisbachwelle située côté Prinzregentenstrasse.

title: Passeggiata nel parco
text: Questo parco non ha niente da invidiare ai più grandi parchi urbani, merita sicuramente una passeggiata! Giardino immenso, con tanto verde, laghi, zone per rilassarsi e localini. Tappa obbligatoria

title: Eine Oase der Ruhe
text: Selbst wenn halb München durch den Park lustwandelt, fühlt man sich nie wirklich eingeengt. Der Park ist einfach zu gross und zu schön. Zu jeder Jahreszeit. Wir mögen einen sonnigen Herbsttag am liebsten. Danach ein Bier beim chinesischen Turm und die Welt ist wieder in Ordnung.

title: Perfekt tur i parken
text: En fantastisk park som har alt du trenger, fra en park. Fin, godt opparbeidet, ulike steder for pauser, elver, små fossefall, surfing. Og milevis med veier.

title: Wundervoller Park
text: Hier kann man gut Spazieren gehen und die Natur genießen. So einen schönen Park hatten wir in München nicht erwartet.
visit: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

title: Verde e cani liberi
text: Passeggiata di una mezza giornata, ma ne servirebbe una intera per visitarlo tutti per bene. Zone per i giochi dei bambini recintate, prati per giocare con i cani, animali selvatici facilmente osservabili. Da vedere!

title: Un très belle promenade
text: Assez central dans la ville vous ne pourrez pas y échapper.On peut y trouver proche de l’ambassade des USA, un morceau du mur de Berlin.Le jardin est accessible et on peut s’y promener en vélo.

title: Parque Enorme
text: Lugar para ser visitado no verão, parque com mais de 15km (isso mesmo) de comprimento. No verão esse parque ferve de gente para tomar sol (as vezes nus) , andar de bicicleta, comer e beber nos vários biergartens, se jogar no rio e deixar a correnteza te lavar por vários quilômetros.

title: Muy bonito
text: Es un sitio súper grande y muy agradable para pasear en bici o caminando , yo cuando llegue oscureció enseguida porque llegue tarde así que recomiendo ir por la mañana

title: DISAPPOINTED!!!
text: We were expecting to see areas of beautiful flowers.  But NONE.Many people laying on blankets on green grass having a picnic.Many people jogging or walking the trails.  Plus many jogging or walking with their dogs.One area--the Chinese Garden--was a HUGE Beer Garden.With Many Food Booths and BEER Booths.  Picnic tables everywhere.  People visiting and drinking BEER.

title: Ein Tag im Englischen Garten mit dem Radl
text: Wie kann man schöner einen sonnigen Herbsttag genießen, als mit der Familie mit dem Radl in den Englischen Garten zu fahren. Selbst in den kühleren Monaten im Herbst ist es immer noch ein tolles Erlebnis. Am schönsten ist es dort aber definitiv im Sommer! Radeln, baden, Picknick, Fußball oder Frisbee spielen... oder am Chinesischen Turm ein paar Mass in einem der Biergärten trinken...Der Central Park von München. Definitiv empfehlenswert!

title: Try delicious chicken;)
text: Actually the most remembered thing will be the extremely delicious chicken buffets located in the middle of the gardens. The park was giant and well preserved. It’s really nice to have park this big in the middle of the city. Lucky muncheners!

title: Very relaxed
text: Really relaxed atmosphere, suitable for families, couples, groups etc.Good food, drinks and we were lucky enough to be there for a live band!

title: Amazing park in the heart of Munich
text: Even you are in a big city you feel that you are in a forest if you visit the English Garden. The water (lake and small revers), the trees, and the whole surrounding is an ideal place to relax. Don't miss it if you visit Munich.

title: Couldn't Find the Gardens
text: We made a special trip to this area to see the "English Gardens" but we never did find  them.  What we did find instead was a huge, green, treed park in the middle of the city.  Be sure to find those surfers, not what we expected to see, but great fun to watch.  I'm not sure why this park is identified as a garden because they don't have any.  We spent the afternoon looking for them, only to be told by a local employee that the park was the garden.

title: Chill and peaceful
text: It's good for travellers that want chilling a day in the park this would be great idea to visit the park for breathe the grass and trees.

title: Eine einzigartige Parkanlage
text: Hingehen,  spazieren, Bier trinken, Surfer beobachten,  Essen. Fehlt was? Nein. Ein Erlebnis pur. Tolle Stadt und neidisch bin ich. Wie schön eine Stadt sein kann, zeigt der englische Garten.
visit: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

title: A lovely afternoon
text: Stunning park with a great atmosphere. We visited on a sunny afternoon and the park was really busy but still very relaxing. Sadly there was no surfing that day. The beer garden was packed but had such a good atmosphere. Watch out for cyclists though who go a little too fast given the amount of people on the paths. A must!

title: Un oasis en la ciudad
text: Hermoso. Relajante. Para un paseo por el verde, disfrutando la naturaleza. Se merece aunque sea un pequeño recorrido.
visit: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

title: Imperdível
text: O Parque é gigantesco, recomendo alugar uma bike ou um carrinho dentro do próprio parque para conhecê-lo inteiro. O parque tem várias atrações, jardins, rio, cervejarias, monumentos e as eisbach wave, aquele lugar onde os surfistas fazem manobras insanas num rio. Atração para a família toda.

title: Beautiful park
text: A great day out in the center of Munich. If there is a nice day it’s absolute a must to walk across the park. Beautiful landscape and nice coffee spots

title: Groot park
text: De Engelse tuin in München is een van de grootste parken van Europa. Het is groter dan Central Park in New York. Erg mooi aangelegd en zeer de moeite waard. Wij hebben met de fiets het park doorkruist want het is echt groot. Veel mensen die er wandelen genieten en zonnebaden. Het park stamt uit de 18e eeuw en heeft behalve veel bomen planten en natuur onder andere een Chinese toren, een Japans theehuis en tempel in Griekse stijl. Aanrader om hier te wandelen, te fietsen en te genieten.

title: Buntes Treiben im englischen Garten
text: Viele Aktivitäten, ob Jung, ob Alt, es herrscht ein buntes Treiben. Eine Gruppe von Trommlern, das hat mich sehr beeindruckt und junge Leute, die nach Harry Potter Manier ihre Bälle übers Feld gespielt haben.  So viele Menschen, die einfach nur den letzten lauen Abend draußen genossen haben. Die Stimmung war wunderschön.

title: skvělý relax
text: krásný upravený park s velkými plochami pro relaxaci... klid a pohoda. uprostřed skvělá restaurace/občerstvení s dostatečně velkým výběrem a rychlou obsluhou

title: Surf na cidade!!
text: Um parque maravilhoso, especialmente no verão,Para curtir música, tranquilidade, cerveja e até surf no Rio
visit: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

title: Harika
text: Kesinlikle tüm gününüzü ayırın ve heryerini gezin. Ekim son haftası çok soğuktu. Botlarınızı giyin. Bira bahçesi biz gittiğimizde kapalıydı.
visit: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

title: a lovely green of munich
text: king ludwig II always appreciated international architecture...loved adding those into his territory. english garden is one, a reflection of hyde park of london. it could have been more creative but i found it pretty plain.

title: Paradise
text: If you’re looking to relax, go for a jog, meditate, or just appreciate nature this is the place for you. It’s such a beautiful landscape of trees and ponds that will reignite your appreciation for nature. Take a walk and just breathe in all the goodness this place has to offer. Give yourself enough time to relax and enjoy.

title: Truly lovely
text: Lovely grounds to walk, enjoy a band, great biergarten and area to paddleboat. One the best locations to quietly enjoy time with family.

title: Amazing open area for beer and food
text: Visited the English garden on Sunday evening and had a great beer and pretzel. Listened to a Traditional German band playing from the Chinesischer Turm and had a very good time. Lots of people also enjoying the evening.
visit: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

title: Beautiful outdoor space
text: Also a really great space to spend time outdoors in Munich.   Lots of room to walk and explore and several beer gardens.  I'm told in the Christmas season you can find a nice market here near the Chinese tower

title: must visit in Munich
text: Incredibly beautiful place ! When you step in you are in a different world ! Peaceful place to spend some quality time

title: Lovely green space for walk/fresh air
text: Although we went at the “wrong” season (October), this still gave us a great opportunity to take a lovely stroll in the park with trees turning lovely golden all around. Nice place to relax and take some fresh air.

title: Wunderschön im Herbst
text: War vor kurzem in München und da konnte ich dem Englischen Garten nicht widerstehen. Wunderschön präsentierte er sich im Herbst mit seinen goldenen Farben. Ein sehr schöner, großflächiger Park mit weitläufigen Wiesen, kleineren Wäldern, schönen Spazierwegen. Es gibt einen (oder mehrere?) Wasserläufe  / Bäche und soetwas wie einen kleinen See, man kann Gänse, Schwäne und div. andere Wasservögel sehen.

title: OMG this 'garden' is huge!
text: The hotel said it would be about a 20 minute walk from Rosenheimer Platz to the Englischer Garten.  It took us forever because I have mobility issues and the area surrounding the garden is extensive.  Then when one arrives at the actual garden where all the sunbathers are en masse it's nearly 45 minutes.  Especially walking in the hot sun when we were visiting. But gosh it is a lovely walk.  Rivers, bridges, foliage with turning leaves, loads and loads of expansive greenery and statues.  Even surfing! What a treat!

title: O mais bacana é o surf no rio ...
text: O mais bacana é o surf no rio ... curioso como junta gente para ver os surfistas de no rio. O complexo de jardins é muito bacana, vale a pena um volta. Tudo é muito bonito e organizado nessa cidade .. mesmo na época de festas.

title: Visited as part of a bike tour; great lunch at the Chinese Pavilion
text: River surfing was really interesting.  Good, hearty lunch, enough food for two or three persons! Roast Chicken and Frikadeller were super; excellent beers.

title: Le poumon vert de Munich
text: Immense (pour les parisiens, habitués aux parcs dont la circonférence dépasse à peine le kilomètre...), ce joli jardin permet d'oublier la ville... sans la quitter.

title: Easy to get lost
text: Very beautiful garden but not too many Signes to tell the way in and about. We found a Lovely beergarden in the middle. But to find the subway  was almost inpossible.
visit: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

title: das grüne Herz der Weltstadt...
text: Der Englische Garten in München ist sogar etwas größer als der Central Park in New York. Aufgrund der Größe fühlt er sich selten als besucher-überlaufen an. Alles schön weitläufig, grün und appetitlich, mit Möglichkeiten zur Einkehr in den verschiedenen Biergärten. Fußläufig von der City aus zu erreichen, bieten Sehenswürdigkeiten wie zum Beispiel der Chinesische Turm oder der wilde Eisbach mit seinen Surfern interessante Aspekte.

title: Giardino pubblico top
text: Bel giardino pubblico con tanto verde, attrazioni e localini. Piacevole scoperta al centro di Monaco

title: Ausgezeichnet
text: Der legendäre Englische Garten in München ist immer bei einem Münchenbesuch ein Muß. Die Weitläufigkeit sowie die Biergärten zeigen die Möglichkeiten bei einem Spaziergang oder Besuch auf.

title: Beautiful Park Garden
text: My friend that resides in Munich took me to the English Garden. I was expecting totally different. I absolutely loved the park, the garden, the gazebo everything was just beautiful.

title: A real MUST  for anyone loving to get lost into this huge lane& trees
text: just outside the university of munich leave at least  half a day , espacially on a sunny one .recommend to start from the upper north point reachable by the u6 . strolling down until you reach the Residenz garden will lead you through

title: Grüne Oase in einer Metrolpole
text: Es ist immer wieder schön, durch den englischen Garten zu laufen. Es ist trotz der vielen Leute nicht überlaufen und man kann in Ruhe schlendern!
visit: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

title: Me encanó
text: Es gigante. Para recorrerlo todo y disfrutarlo requeriría entre medio día y un día entero. De lo que pude conocer me encantó. Es muy variado. Tiene lagos hermosos y un río angosto que corre muy rápido lo que le da la peculiaridad de que en él hagan surf. Tiene zonas despejadas en la que se conforman claros y otras zonas con vegetación frondosa. reitero que requiere de mucho tiempo si se lo quiere recorrer todo.

title: Cool place
text: Cool and quiet place, a lot of walking needed to see it. Perfect time to can take a rest. We had really nice time there.
visit: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

title: Don’t skip this while in Munich
text: Absolutely loved English Garden and so glad we took the time to visit while in Munich.  We walked through the park on a Sunday and stopped at two of the mini beer gardens and watched the surfers in the river.  The park is very large and very beautiful.  The beer gardens were beautiful and showed the awesome Bavarian culture (and awesome food).The river surfing was also very cool.
visit: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

title: Schön und wirklich grün :-)
text: Einer der schönsten Parks der Stadt.Monopteros und Chinesischer Turm. Seehaus und die vielen Enten.Wunderbar!

title: Amazing open space in central Munich
text: Central Park is all well and good if you live in NYC, but there are several features of Munich's massive city center park that NY will never touch:>>>>Three of Munich's best Bier Gartens -- including the three largest in the worldAcres and acres of mown grass on which to play frisbee or watch the water flow past on a beautiful day.>>>>>A "surfing buch" artificial surfing place built into one of the canals through the park.   Get close up views of some very impressive surfers.>>>>A large field where nudism is allowed and even protected, though not from hordes of gaping tourists (and amazingly invasive picture takers.)  Avoid the gawkers by going to the center or take a turn shocking them on the periphery.>>>>A herd of sheep (if you go far enough away from downtown).  Grass guzzling animals are a whole lot cheaper than gas guzzling mowers>>>>A "Chinese" tower and a "Greek Temple" >>>>Pedalcabs that while whisk you through the highlights for a fistful of EurosRolling ice cream vendors (OK, Central Park has those too, but the ice cream seems to taste better here.)----->>>>  Safety note.  The English Garden is safer than Central Park at almost any time of day.   The southern (downtown side) is generally safe at night, but the upper reaches of the park can be dicey after dark.  Still assaults are rare enough to be front page news when they do, and you won't get shot..

title: Bei tollem Wetter - einfach schön
text: Der englische Garten im Herzen Münchens ist einfach immer wieder schön zum spazieren und verweilen. Am chinesischen Turm sitzt man bei einem guten Münchner Bier ( bezahlbar ) Ein Muss für einen München Besuch.
visit: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

title: Wonderful walk at the park
text: English Garden is beautiful throughout the year - cold warm rainy or dry it has its character! We have been there in cold and foggy weather , it was nostalgic and so winter vibe, and recently in October with 20 degrees nice walk , beer and nice cigar ...in any occasion this park welcomes you and people love to hang out here

title: Gran plan
text: Nada más relajante que ir a pasar un día lleno de verde y relax a la orilla del rio  en el jardín inges

title: Lovely place for an autumn walk
text: Beautiful gardens with lots of well looked after paths to potter along. The autumn colours now are really beautiful and there are plenty of ducks and other birds to enjoy. I saw a little cafe which looked nice so I guess you can get a drink and a piece of cake but I didn't try it out.

title: Huge park
text: We went on Saturday, after we found free parking space we started exploring the area near the lake were there is plenty of ducts, dine at Seehaus, walk the wide green spaces and lush trees started changing into autumn colors, kindly chilly, many people relaxing, haven't seen any naked people since it was chilly and cloudy. Passing by the famous beer garden on our way to the surfing area which was unfortunately closed but still people stayed to relax watching slow moving stream. I would definitely go back here during summer.

title: bellissima esperienza
text: ottobre a Monaco con 24 gradi di temperatura, un giardino con ampi prati verdi per prendere il sole giocare a calcio e fare picnic. al centro c'è una grande piazza con tavoli all'aperto per bere e mangiare atmosfera Oktoberfest, a pochi passi poi ci sono dei ragazzi che praticano surf su un pezzo di fiume che crea onde spettacolo da vedere

title: Som en mindre svensk stad
text: Denna park är enorm. Man kan vandra i timmar längs små vattenströmmar eller i ren skog. Gigantiska gräsytor lockar Münchenborna, inte minst på helgerna. Sjö med trampbåtar för familjer eller par. Och så klart; restauranger och Biergartens för den hungrige och törstige. Missa inte den konstgjorda surfingvågen i sydöstra hörnet!

title: Lovely afternoon in the gardens
text: Spent whole afternoon in the gardens and as it was october the autumn colours were amazing. The park is huge so to make sure we saw everything we hired some electric scooters which were a huge hit with my sons - we could not possibly have covered all we did without them . Would recommend a visit here .

title: Beautiful and astoningly big garden
text: If you want to get a glimpse of "real" Munich - well, then you have to go there. Starting close to the very city centre and reaching up along Isar river to the north end of Munich it offers a variety seldom seen elsewhere. Surfers riding a standing wave next to Haus der Kunst, nudist enjoying the sun, a fantastic beer garden under a historic pagoda, vast meadows, even hunting the game...

title: Well established tradition
text: Very pleasant walking, large picnic spaces, beer gardens, peddle boats on the lake and hundreds of passersby, dog walking, cycling; it's all there and worth a visit. Access by public transit, parking nearby, Christmas market in December....

title: Lovely park
text: Well worth it to take a walk from hofgarten to the eisbachwelle. From there if you're too tired to walk back to marienplatz,  you could take tram 16 .
visit: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

title: Must see
text: Love this place. Huge public park with a food market in the middle that serves beer. You can even buy a beer stein if you want. Gets crowded and the whole operation can seem like a machine (not much time to ask questions given the number of people coming in and out) but well worth it overall, even if just to walk through. Need a sweater or good jacket if you’re going in the fall/autumn.

title: Beautiful and peaceful!
text: Beautiful Garden in the middle of Munich.  Feels like you are not even in the city!  Visit the restaurant area for lunch and a beer.  Music was playing by a band while we were there too!

title: an oasis
text: we both walked through this then rented bikes a day later and rode the length of the Garden.  Beautiful.  2 rivers one of which featured river surfing and a nice small lake.  Safe and delightful.

title: Meraviglioso giardino infinito
text: Prima volta che siamo riusciti ad andare a rilassarci in questo giardino: bellissimo, silenziosissimo, e spero di tornare e passare una giornata intera godendo di tutto ciò che offre: pace, tranquillità, cibo, lago e tanto, tanto tantissimo verde curatissimo!!!

title: Beautiful and relaxing
text: This is a must visit location in Munich. The landscape and environment is gorgeous and easily walkable. There are many benches available for sitting to watch ducks, waterfalls, etc.  Just a beautiful and serene green space to enjoy in the middle of the bustling city. Really puts Central Park to shame

title: La natura in città
text: Davvero bello il parco, spazi verdi, alberi e un fiume che scorre fanno di questo parco una oasi naturale nel centro della città

title: Great fun
text: The gardens are beautiful.  Well worth the time just to see the surfers!  The beer garden was not open while we were there, but still worth the trip.

title: Enormous park, needs more signs
text: Bigger than Central Park and a really nice space. There is a lake to go rowing on, A beer garden in the middle and masses of paths to walk on. There are a few "you are here" signs but there needs to be a lot more. Due to its size, you can be heading in the wrong direction for quite some time (as we did). The people surfing the canal are at the very southern tip of the garden.

title: Surf and turf
text: What a beautiful few steps (5 min walk) from busy town centre. There was a river, surfing folks and a big field to relax on...even super friendly geese.A very pretty place, well on a par with central park new York.
visit: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

title: Huge
text: English Garden is an inevitable inclusion in any tourist itinerary of the city. Not surprising when you visit it - big, with several interesting spots (beer garden, Chinese tower, surfing spot et al, Monopteros) and friendly locals...

title: Família
text: O lugar é lindo e vale a pena visitar . No dia que fomos lá o tempo estava maravilhoso , pudemos deitar na grama e relaxar. Além de assistir aos surfistas que surfam no rio.

title: Grüne Oase im Zentrum
text: Nur wenige Minuten von Schwabing entfernt liegt die grüne Lunge Münchens. Eine riesige Parkanlage mit großem See, vielen Bächen, Wiesen, Bäumen, Bänken und natürlich (München) Biergärten.

title: Lieber unter der Woche
text: Sollte man auf jeden Fall durchlaufen. Sehr schön zum spazieren gehen und Seele baumeln lassen. Am Wochenende wird jedoch ein großes Familientag und Touristenattraktion daraus.

title: Liberté et Naturisme
text: Nous avons passé 15 jours de bonheur à Munich ! Ville calme agréable insolite....Englisher Gaten est un parc unique au monde ou pendant 15 jours nous étions nus le long de schwabinger bach à proximité de Schonfeldwiese aucun regard aucune remarque ! Les allemands ont une ouverture d'esprit que les Français leur envient.Au programme / Matin visite des monuments ; après-midi bronzage et baignade nu au parc.. Le paradis.

title: 어마어마하게 큰 공원
text: 여름이나 해가 쨍쨍할 때 오면 너무 좋을 것 같다.내가 갔을 때는 아침에 비가 조금 내려서 사람이 많이 없었는데, 강물도 흐르고 나무도 크고 잔디도 넓고 조용해서 좋았다.영국정원이 아래쪽(시내쪽)으로 가다보면 강물에서 서핑을 하는 모습도 볼 수 있다.

title: Not really a pedestrian tourist attraction
text: I say that because it's very large place and you really need a bicycle and several hours to explore it properly. Yes, there are a few attractions that you can walk to from the city center at the southern edge of the park. However, the original purpose was to give harried city dwellers a place to decompress. If you're burned out from several days of museum touring, this could be the antidote. However, I'm not sure it merits a visit all on its own (other than to see the Eisbachwelle surf break, Chinese Tower beer garden, etc.).

title: Oasi di pace
text: Bello il contesto, un angolo di paradiso in una grande città come Monaco di Baviera..suggestivi i corsi d'acqua specie dove alcuni spericolati praticano surf, in cui la corrente dell'acqua è davvero forte..e sarà pure fredda..! Si può anche gustare un'ottima birra con varie pietanze tipiche presso il ristorante self-service presente all'interno del parco.
visit: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

title: Perfect for a sunny afternoon
text: We made our way over here during one of our last days in Munich, just to explore and pass some time before heading back to Oktoberfest. It turned out to be a perfect spot to relax, soak up some sun, and essentially detox after a long previous night. Next time, we'll have to remember a towel so we can cool off in the river.

title: Stunning parkland scenery and lake
text: Definitely recommend, especially on a sunny day. The park is absolutely huge and there is a lot to see while wandering around. There are little bridges scattered around that go over the river and streams that flow through the park. It really is lovely to walk around. Definitely recommend seeing eisbach - a unique area of the manmade river in the park where local surfers come to surf the waves on the river (yes waves). It takes about 30 minutes to walk to the other side of the park so it could easily take 1.5 hours to walk the park in a circle as there are so many lovely paths.If you don't fancy walking for that long, you can rent a bike or use one of the electric scooters scattered around the paths via an app by Companies such as  Lime, Jump (Uber), Bird or Tier. A great spot for wildlife enthusiasts as well as there are waterfowl, mole hills and friendly dogs being walked throughout.Horse and cart rides were frequent the day that we were there. There is also a few great restaurants up on the North side of the park beside the lake.
visit: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

title: Mooi park
text: Heel leuk park, erg groot. Leuk om rond te lopen. De surfers zij  leuk om te zien. Het restaurant is echter vreselijk, heel druk, echt een vreetschuur met stinkend vet.

title: Bike or walk
text: It's lovely, only a little further than the Residenz. Has vast green areas, willows over water, swans, forested paths.

title: Me encanto!!!!
text: Muy bonito parque,con un río que hace que te puedas dar un baño con cascada muy verde y con patos paseando tranquilamente me gusto mucho un gran pulmón para la ciudad,se puede hacer un picnic...tomar cervezas.....

title: Biergarten Hirschau authentische Gastronomie
text: Breites Angebot an typischen Speisen und Getränken zu fairen Preisen.Freundlich, schnell und herzlich. Gemütlich und Kinderfreundlich.

title: wonderful
text: One of the nicest public parks I’ve ever been to, with a couple of amazing features. Foremost is the Chinese Tower beer garden, where we had lunch and a welcome break. Second are the areas where you can watch surfers practicing their sport. And third is the people watching. Definitely a great place to visit in Munich.
visit: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

title: Brilliant
text: Lovely park, with exceptional walk paths.One should take 4 hours out, roam around for an hour, then head to the beer garden at the Chinese tower, and spend two hours there and walk back satisfied.A few buses stop at the Chinese tower as well.Worth every moment spent here..
visit: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

title: Eine Oase
text: Der riesige Park mitten in München lädt zum Verweilen ein. Nicht nur die `Nackerten` im Sommer sind einen Besuch wert. Das japanische Teehaus auf einer Halbinsel, den Monopterus, den Biergarten vom chinesischen Turm und natürlich die kleine Surferwelle sollte man unbedingt besuchen.

title: Οκ
text: Το πάρκο και η φύση είναι όλο ωραία. Εκτός από όλους τους ανθρώπους με μαγιό που κάθονται πανό και σε εκνευρίζουν. Καλύτερα να πάνε στην λίμνη στο πάρκο βρήκαν να την βγάλουνε!?

title: Beautiful - must see
