title: A narrow but very long park. And very interesting experience of visiting it.
text: Literally a huge sausage along the Isar River. A couple of creeks also pass through the park, which pass through a pond at the Chinese Tower and end at a small waterfall, which is used by local surfers.My wife and I went around only 1/5 of the park, but even so we got an interesting impression. First, we met several groups of people swimming in a creek. Then we were very surprised to see an enormous number of people resting in open green areas with picnics. People with picnics also come out at our local park on weekends, but I have never seen so many people like here. Then we went to the Chinese Tower, which had food service stalls, fenced with a pass system and many tables at which people ate. Near the tower was a restaurant with beautiful architecture. Then, when we went further, we once again saw an open area with a large number of vacationers, and another bathing place. This time there were stones with a small waterfall from which they coped on rubber rings. At the end of the park, on a small island, there was a Japanese tea house, which we didn't get in because of the long waiting line. And on the other side there was a place fiercely chosen by surfers and their fans, since there they could ride on a stream of water emerging in the creek. Very interesting park and experience visiting it. I think on another day it would be deserted, so if you visit it, I highly recommend doing it on a day off or some holiday.

title: Perfect city park

title: Nice park in middle of the city
text: Best part was the standing wave in the creek that goes through the middle of the park.  Where several streams come together, there is a permanent large standing wave where surfers (in wet suits of course) wade out and actually surf.  Great photo-op.

title: Beautiful place
text: A beautiful and relaxing place.  If I lived in Munich I would be there every day.  Its fun to watch surfers in a German city!

title: Beautiful Park
text: It was a lovely day to go to the English Garden. Walking is very easy with paved pathways and food and beer along the way.

title: Amazing park
text: Went there on a warm sunny Sunday and it was packed, but still didn’t feel crowded. Gigantic, beautiful and filled with many places to sit and watch the passing parade of people. The surfers were fun to watch. Not like SoCal or Hawaii, but they are making the best of a land locked city. The river running through the park is pretty and pretty rapid, but people are in it swimming and having fun when weather is good. If you want some exercise or forest bathing, visit the English garden.

title: If you have time necessary to walk.
text: We have been there on february it was little bit cold but sunny. We walked with kids in the Garden It is really big and I am sure will be more better in Autumn or Sipring.

title: Ein Ort der Erholung und des Genusses
text: Ob Flanieren oder Entspannung im Park, ob Surfer am Eiskanal oder einfach nur ein gutes Maß Bier und ein Händl am "Chinesischen Turm". Der Englische Garten ist immer ein Muss für mich.

title: Delicioso piquenique no rio
text: Parque enorme, com inúmeros gramados excelente para um piquenique em um dia de sol. Biergarten com música bávara ao vivo, parque infantil e torre Chinesa. Muitos lugares para sentar! Rio tem a água fria mesmo com sol mas é muito bom para refrescar no auge do verão. Monopteros é um local lindo para fotos. Leve um mapa e garrafinha de água , pois parque é enorme!

title: Bello
text: Il giardino inglese di Monaco è enorme, ben tenuto in quasi tutte le sue parti e frequentato da ogni genere di persona, si possono anche liberare i cani per farli giocare, al suo interno vi sono anche chioschi dove comprare bibite o gelato e un ristorante. Nel complesso vale la pena farci una passeggiata in un pomeriggio di sole.

title: Meraviglia increibile
text: Questo parco merita anche da solo la visita di Monaco. Enorme, bellissimo, pulito. Una location fantastica in cui sentirsi immersi nella natura. È possibile rilassarsi sull’erba, vicino al lago, ai torrenti. Gustarsi del cibo, girare in bici. Un posto da sogno.
visit: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

title: Englischer Garten München - Muss man gesehen haben !
text: Meine Mädels und ich gehen regelmäßig im Englischen Garten in München spazieren, ein Muss für jeden München Besucher ! Egal ob im Sommer (genial) oder auch zur Winterszeit, hier kann man in Ruhe flanieren und seine Zeit verbringen.

title: English Garden
text: Great place for a morning/afternoon stroll away from the traffic. Allow 2-3 hours and a good 2-3 miles walk.Take 15 minutes to watch the surfers on the Eisbach river. There is a concrete step under the surface that produces a 1 metre wave. Also the chinese tower where you can rest and have a beer/ snack. Nearby is a Monopteros, a Greek style temple with great views of the city.

title: 天国のような公園
text: 川ではサーフィンを楽しむ人や水遊びをしている人、水着で川辺でくつろぐ人、が沢山いました。その人たちを眺めながら散策するだけで楽しいです。１日楽しめる公園です。

title: Bellissimo, ma tutto in tedesco!!! :))
text: Bellissimo il parco e tutte ció che è all’interno, merita assolutamente la visita, unica pecca, ci fosse una indicazione in un altra lingua che non sia il tedesco!! :))

title: IMPERDIBILE!
text: Se siete stati a Monaco di Baviera ma non avete nai visitato la pagoda del giardino inglese,non sapete quello che vi siete persi.Una birra buonissima e le costine di maiale che,se le assaggia Rubio,chiede la cittadinanza onoraria!Una sosta obbligata quando si arriva in questa meravigliosa città. Andateci!

title: Pulmão de Munique
text: Maior que o Central e o Hyde Park. Lindo! Muito divertido ver os alemães surfando e o Biergarten é ótimo! Super astral

title: English garden outdoor vender booth
text: We liked the outdoor vendor that provided beer, sausages and crepes for us to sit and enjoy the lake view.
visit: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

title: Erstmals besucht
text: Schon lange wollten wir den englichen Garten besichtigen. Diesmal hat es nun endlich geklappt. Eine wunderbare und gepflegte Anlage! Sehr sehenswert.

title: Decimpress
text: Beautiful relief from heat or hustle from city. Beware cyclists getting in. Great open cafe at edge of park
visit: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

title: Nice garden’s
text: We walked around the English garden’s it has a nice lake that you can rent a boat to enjoy the lake, the are places to get food, you can ride your bike around the English garden’s  There are buses that go into the garden s too
visit: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

title: Magnificent
text: It felt like one could walk forever in the park. A river runs through it as do numerous canals and beer gardens. We lunches lakeside after a long and lovely walk. It was a memorable day.

title: Evasione dal caos
text: Bellissimo parco molto grande. Diciamo che Monaco centro è troppa o caotica per i miei gusti perciò ho apprezzato tantissimo questo parco. Consiglio a tutti 😉😊
visit: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

title: A Grand Walk
text: The English Garden wasn’t typically English in my mind as I would associate that with flowers. More like open parkland but enjoyable nevertheless. Obviously very popular with walkers, cyclists, picnickers, runners, families, relaxation classes, yoga etc and even surfers (you have to see it for yourself!). Dog walkers are even provided with free doggy bags. Being in Germany there was the expected nude sunbather too, elderly male (aren’t they all?). If you have time and crave some peace, traffic free, then its a relatively short walk from Marienplatz.
visit: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

title: Huge beautiful park
text: Beautiful park. Great waterfalls, fast moving rivers, surfboarders, pretty gardens. You can travel around the park on foot, bike, electric scooter or horse and carriage

title: Wonderful park with walking/running trails and surfers!
text: A bus leaves Munich central train station and drops you off in the middle of this park where you can stroll or run.  It is a very large park.  Don't miss the surfers, yes surfers, on the Eisbach, a small channel of the Isar River at the south end of the park.  They surf the continuous, ice-cold wave that rolls through the channel all day long.

title: visit for the fame
text: A nice Park but nothing more . I supose its a great escape for Muncheneese durring summer weekends to take a walk and cool down . Starbucks coffe nearby serving as usual good cofee .

title: A nice surprise
text: Over for a weekend and very surprised by this beautiful park that is in a classical English designe,  A lovely place to spend an afternoon.
visit: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

title: Beautiful
text: The park is huge and beautiful. If the weather is nice, you can have a picnic there and just enjoy the views (just be advised public nudity in the park is apparently legal and somewhat common).Overall beautiful place.
visit: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

title: Do not miss
text: A beautiful park.  Make a point of watching the surfers.  Also make a point to rent bikes.  Great way to see the park.
visit: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

title: Excellent Park
text: It is execellent park to walk and to take a break from shopping. It will be very good if you will take a pike and drive around to see the whole park, there is a taxi but it is a little bit expensive,

title: Beautiful garden
text: The atmosphere was fabulous and we enjoyed it so muchVery nice garden with large areas for walking and also a racetrack for bicycle lovers

title: Sight seeing
text: The English gardens are just beautiful , and was a lovely day , the beer garden is great and we had strudel really nice .Went and watched the surfing in the river in the English garden.
visit: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

title: Bring your walking shoes
text: The best way to see the park would probably be on a bike tour. The garden is so big it is hard to take in everything. We didn't realize you could not rent bikes within the park and spent a lot of time getting lost looking for them! The view from the greek temple gave a great view of the important buildings in Munich (and a few cranes). Seeing the surfers at the south edge of the park is a must do! Their skill in such a small space is very impressive!

title: Wunderschön
text: Ich liebe einfach solche Orte, wo man ohne Ende laufen kann und die Natur bewundern kann. Mir hat es gut gefallen obwohl es sehr regnerisch war. Aber na ja, das Wetter ist so, wie es ist :)

title: Huge beautiful
text: The gardens are amazingly beautiful. It is a huge park, with plenty of bike and walking paths. When the sun shines, the park get lots of people walking, biking or just laying under the sun. Really worth visiting.
visit: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

title: Belleza natural
text: Este parque de acceso público es un oasis en la ciudad; en el cual turistas y locales disfrutan del aire libre. Cuenta con un Biergarten, donde podes sentarte a comer platos típicos alemanes, dulces o salados o, simplemente, consumir una cerveza rodeado de calma y naturaleza.

title: Mi lugar favorito en Múnich
text: Es un parque enorme y precioso.Hay que dejar un día, al menos, para disfrutarlo. Alquila una bici o pasea...come algo y bebe una buena cerveza en la pagoda. Si tienes tiempo pasea, ve el lago, cruza los puentes y túmbate en el césped para retomar fuerzas.

title: Immer einen Besuch wert
text: Mit der schönste Park in München. Der Biergarten am Chinesischen Turm zwar sehr touristisch und die Preise sehr gesalzen aber alles gut und man sitzt einfach sehr schön dort. Der Park an sich sehr weitläufig und schön.Das Einzige was total nervt wie aber in ganz München die überall wild abgestellten E-Roller und Miet-Räder.
visit: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

title: Immer ein Besuch wert!
text: Ein MUSS wenn man in München lebt! Es gibt unzählige tolle Ecke, tolle Biergärten und Restaurant. Ein Ort für die ganze Familie!

title: The bier garten by the Chinese Tower is a must do
text: Enjoy the bier garten by the Chinese Tower. The band played in the tower, the food and beer flowed, and the people watching was outstanding. We took a taxi there and back, but we saw several city buses.

title: Big park
text: Nice park with forests and loads of open space, there is a large nudist section if that is what you are into!

title: Zeer mooi
text: Zeer grote stadspark met een kleine meer. Mooie padjes met banken. Daar is ook japanse huis en Eisbach voor surfing. Vanuit Monopteros kan je een zeer mooi uitzicht beleven. Een aanrader voor iedereen dus.

title: En god oplevelse
text: Parken er smuk og stor. Vi gik ind fra Schwabing og havde nogle gode timer i dejligt solskin væk fra storbyens larm.
visit: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

title: Sweet and well kept
text: This is a beautiful and well kept garden in the centre of Munich. Definitely check our the surfers as they are such an unusual sight. The water is very fast flowing here due to the surfing.
visit: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

title: Beautiful area
text: We enjoyed walking through this area. It is beautifully maintained and has lots of different paths and activities. We watched people surfing in the current of the lake! Definitely worth the detour.

title: Wander to your hearts content
text: We went with family-adults- brought a blanket and picnic fare; supplemented beverages from vendors— great people watching- serene outdoor environment. Accessible to the Chinese Tower and surfers by walking. Many grassy spots along the river.

title: Big garden with some surprises
text: Look out for the surfers as you enter the gardens from the old town at Haus der Kunst. There are two or three spots to see them. Great to watch these adrenaline junkies do their thing. Would never have expected it and it was busy with them all!Chinese tower and Bier garden were great. Easily enough room to hold thousands of people!Didnt see it all as it is massive but what we saw of it was brilliant.

title: Time out and green in the city
text: Walking to the English garden and visiting the different areas is one way you can always spend your weekends or evenings after work if you live in Munich  or even a whole day if you are visiting the city. The Garden with it various sections offers ample opportunities to go for walks, picnic, play ball games, go running, ride your bikes or enjoy a beer with friends and strangers at one of the bear gardensI like the Chinese tower beer garden because they have the traditional Bavarian music there from a live band. If you are with smaller kids its also close to a beautiful playground. From the Monopteros you get a good view of the park. You also have the Japanese tea house and the Seehaus Restaurant & Beer GardenIts a great way to spend a day and evening with alone or with friends in Munich

title: Ruhige gemütliche Athmosphäre am Turm
text: Biergarten Essen und Trinken bei Sonnenschein- was will man mehr...Vernünftige Preise und gutes Essen. PS: Wochentags ist es natürlich viel ruhiger.

title: Paseo espectacular
text: Pasamos la tarde paseando, respirando aire fresco, viendo a la gente tomando el sol, nadando y haciendo surf. Es una gozada poder disfrutar de tanta naturaleza. Volveremos. Loli. Una murciana.

title: Perfecto para perderse
text: El jardin ingles es un lugar perfecto para deambular por el si ya has visto Munich o tienes tiempo libre, es muy grande y ofrece un entorno precioso, de los mejores parques que he visitado

title: Pretty and Peaceful
text: Beautiful park to walk, enjoy lunch at the Chinese beer garden while listening to the band. My suggestion is to take one of the pedal drivers to take you around the entire park as it is difficult to navigate. Whatever you do, do not leave the park without seeing the surfers.. Truly amazing!
visit: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

title: A lovely place with a surprise !!
text: The park itself is beautiful and had wonderful facilities for those wishing to surf ! However be aware that it’s also a place that welcomes and legally allows nudists to walk around. It’s a shock at first but one gets used to this very unenglish phenomenon. Photographs are forbidden .

title: A real treat in the middle of a city
text: So called because it is set out like an English garden.  A haven of peace in the middle of the city.  A must!

title: So beautiful - and huge! Great place for a walk and a relaxed afternoon
text: A must-do in Munich - take a walk in the summer and you'll see so many people stretched out on the grass, picnicking, sunbathing, cycling, even swimming in the fast-flowing river! Such a lovely way to spend an afternoon away from the city. Go to the Chinese Tower Beer Garden, too, for a beer and some excellent "kasespatzle".

title: Nice place
text: We spend the afternoon there with our 2.5 years old girlNice garden with lots of restaurants and local large beer Perfect place to hangout with friends and kids

title: Très joli endroit de verdure
text: C'est le Central Park de Munich en plus grand Assez étonnant avec une tour Chinoise - un endroit pour surfer - vous pouvez y déguster une bonne bière Munichois - vous y reposer - balader - courir Après la Visite de Munich vous y allez pour pour vous ressourcer Vaut le détours

title: English garden
text: Great place to visit for all the family,you can swim ride a bike have food and drink or just relax in the sun

title: 土日に行くべき？
text: 私は合流予定だった親のフライとかキャンセルになり1日暇になったため、ホテルのフロントにもお勧めされていたここに行きました。前日寝るのが早く5時台から起きていた為ホテルを10:30過ぎに出て地下鉄でOdeonsplatzで下車し歩いて行きました。平日の11時過ぎという事や、閑散期なため人があまりいない印象を受けましたが公園に行けば人がいるだろうと思い公園に向かうことに。しかし、公園内のミーティングスポットであるはずのChinesischer Turmには沢山の長テーブルと椅子がありほぼ12時にもかかわらずその場にいたのは私と数人の観光客のみ…。一応水とウインナーを買い食べてサクサクと帰りました。前日の日曜日はバスで公演を見かけた時はとても人で賑わっている印象を受けたので、天気が良く閑散期でなければきっと素敵な公園なんだろうなと思います。個人的な感想は巨大な新宿御苑です。

title: Excellent place to walk and chill
text: We walked through the southern gardens several times on the way from our hotel to the old town and it was great to see the locals cycling and generally relaxing. Then  there are the river surfers near the entrance

title: immer wieder schön
text: lockere Atmosphäre,gute Gastronomie,schöne Spazierwege viele Attraktionen,sehr schöne Biergärten mit meist freundlicher kompetenter Bedienung

title: Englisher Garten
text: A huge park with Beergärten and sunbarhing area, partly nudists around and the well-know chineese Turm. zIt is worth visiting once when you are around.

title: Jardin à l'Anglaise à Munich
text: Ballade incontournable à faire à Munich.On y découvre un spot pour surfeurs, un temple à la grecque et le plus grand Biergarten (7000 bancs) de Bavière autour d'une tour chinoise ! Mais surtout on peut s'y promener tranquillement tout en étant dans une grande ville ...

title: Fuga dal cemento
text: Consiglio di passarci una giornata intera, magari usando una bicicletta, dato che a piedi in un giorno è impossibile visitarlo tutto. Dimenticherete di essere in una città e vi sembrerà di avere fatto una gita in campagna. Ottima la possibilità di mangiare e bere presso la pagoda cinese.

title: Absolutes Highlight in München!!
text: So ein wunderschöner Park. Im Sommer kann man dort super baden gehen oder einfach entspannen. Mein absolutes Highlight: den Surfern an der Eisbachwelle zu sehen. Ansonsten hat der Park einiges schönes zu bieten und auch einige Cafés und Restaurant am Parkrand/um dem Park herum

title: Passeggiando in bicicletta
text: Affittate una bici e godetevi il benessere che una bella passeggiata in riva al fiume, tra i verdi prati magnificamente curati e adeguate zone di ristoro, possa darvi. Una tipica orchestrina allietera' le vostre lunghe pedalate e se per caso foste accaldati... niente paura, lasciatevi trasportare dalla piacevole  corrente del fiume lento. Una giornata di pieno relax praticamente a portata di mano! Che la serenità sia con voi 😊

title: Precioso!
text: Un buen pulmón en el centro de Múnich, se disfruta paseando, viendo a los surferos en la ola artificial del canal, muy divertida la banda alemana que toca en la pagoda y muy rica la cerveza que te tomas en la terraza de debajo de la misma.

title: Englisch Garten
text: All'interno dei Giardini si gode aria pulita e si può gustare un'ottima birra e buon cibo. Consigliato per vivere un pomeriggio in relax dopo avere visitato la città di Monaco.

title: sehr schöner park mitten in der Stadt
text: Wir waren mit dem Fahrrad im Englischen Garten wunderschöne Anlage mitten in der Stadt, sehr schöne Biergärten

title: Oase der Entspannung
text: Gemütlicher Ausklang eines Tages im Biergarten am Chinesischen Turm mit Freunden. Ein Hilight ist auch immer wieder die Eisbachwelle.

title: 칠링하기 좋은 장소
text: 뮌헨 중심부에 있는 큰 공원입니다. 혼자 산책하기에도 좋고, 친구들과 간식이나 맥주를 들고 가서 먹고 마시기에도 좋습니다.

title: great variety of entertainment in a park
text: Just have a stroll through the park and discover the different corners of it. Watch the surfers in the river , even in winter they surf!, the many different locations of beer gardens,either under the trees or at the lake, or with live music. Take your shoes off and feel the ice cold water of the very strong current river. Just lie down, relax and just take it all in. I love the atmosphere !!

title: Der Central Park der Münchener
text: Was für die New Yorker der Central Park ist, ist für die Münchner der Englische Garten. Zu Fuß oder mit dem Fahrrad. Als Ruhesuchender auf der Liegewiese oder für sportliche Betätigung im Eisbach. Tretboot fahren und Biergarten am See - alles da. Und für jeden das Richtige dabei. Familien mit Kindern treffen sich gerne zum Picknick am Wasser oder auf dem Kinderspielplatz am Englischen Turm. Ich persönlich mag alles, mein Highlight ist allerdings der ruhigere Norden mit seiner Weitläufigkeit verbunden mit einem abschließenden Besuch im Hirschau Biergarten, der nicht nur sehr leckeres Essen, sondern auch einen tollen Spielplatz für Kids hat.

title: Family trip
text: Υπέροχο μέρος για οικογενειακές εξορμήσεις στη φύση (παραμένοντας όμως στο κέντρο του Μονάχου) αλλά και για ατομική χαλάρωση/ξεκούραση και βόλτα είτε με ποδήλατα είτε περπατώντας,Οπωσδήποτε μια Βαυαρέζικη μπύρα κάτω από την Κινέζικη Παγόδα θα σε ξεδιψάσει όπως πρέπει!

title: Englischer Garten
text: Immer einen Besuch Wert, gerade mit Hund. Extrem großer Park, sehr weitläufig, mit guten Restaurants und Biergarten

title: Lovely place.
text: A must visit for those who likes nature, a well maintained English designed garden. You can enjoy walking , and the scenery.

title: Always a good place to be
text: Great place to calm down from city strolling.Pass the surfers wave at the south tip of the park and walk all the way north to Biergarten "Chinesischer Turm". Relax, play and wonder how all the dogs come along with each other.

title: Der Garten der Münchener
text: Eine grüne Oase in mitten der schnelllebigen Innenstadt. Von ruhig bis actionreich ist alles geboten, ob Sonnenanbeter oder Schattensuchende, es ist für alle etwas.

title: Must visit once in Munich
text: It’s a great place to spend half day at , get your food , football, swimming suit and anything you want . Just be free, some people go free of clothes too there so take care not to get offended or offend anyone specially when you have kids or there is cultural issues regarding this action .You can enjoy walking or biking or using scooter . Didn’t have time to try the Beer there , yet it’s highly recommended by many people .

title: Walk through the park
text: A lovely park to stroll through. Lots of places to sit and soak up the views. There are lots of places to find food and refreshments. Great spaces for families and dogs.
visit: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

title: Relaxing Day
text: Wonderful place in the middle of the city to relax, walk or bike around, or enjoy a beer at one of the beer gardens.
visit: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

title: Visita obligada
text: Enorme en extensión. Sorprende las distintas zonas, todas muy bellas. Buen lugar para pasar la tarde cuando el tiempo acompaña.

title: GIARDINI BELLISSIMI.
text: Un grande parco, bellissimo, molto curato. C'era anche un musicista che suonava il violoncello sotto una piccola cappella nel parco. Indimenticabile.

title: Natura incontaminata
text: Tapp obbligatoria se si è a Monaco, molto utile per rigenerarsi. Passeggiare qua è un sollievo, si è completamente immersi nel verde e a contatto con la natura.

title: Amazing
text: This was part of our biking tour. We got to check out the Biergarten at the Chinese Tower and partake in some good German food and beer.

title: Zentrum der Altstadt
text: Schöner Blick auf altes und neues Rathaus, direkt in der Münchner Altstadt gelegen. Schöner Ausgangspunkt für eine Stadtführung bzw. einen Stadtspaziergang

title: Really peaceful place
text: We didn’t go on the best day as it was raining, but it’s still really popular & a very large open space in the middle of the city. Large ponds & good footpaths right the way through. If you find it there is also people surfing on the river which is pretty cool to watch. If you can use the electric scooters (we used the Lime ones) it’s a good way of getting round if you have time pressures.

title: Great Place for kids and adults to relax
text: We visited the English Garden in Munich.It is a great place to walk and relax amidst greenery.We got some good beer and food near the Chinese Pagoda, and sat down for a good time.There was a good play area for kids nearby and they enjoyed playing there.On the return we walked around in the greenery, and relaxed.

title: Obrovský park
text: English Garden jsem si nechal jako svou poslední atrakci, kterou v Mnichově navštívím a byla jednou z těch, která mě nadchla nejvíce. Velikost parku bych přirovnal snad k nějakému městečku/maloměstu protože je vskutku obrovský a projít ho zabere opravdu nějaký čas. Já prošel tak půlku a měl jsem vážne dost. Moc se mi líbilo jak zde lidé relaxovali a užívali si, hráli nejrůznější sporty nebo se jen slunili, dělali si piknik apod. Jen bych dával větší pozor na cestičkách protože cyklistů a bruslařů je tady habaděj a vyříti se na Vás zničehonic. Uprostřed parku se nachází i nějaká restaurace/kavárna kde můžete zavítat.

title: Large beautiful park
text: Really nice park with lakes, creeks and bridges. Lots of benches and several cafes and rental places of boats and water bikes.

title: Da Norimberga a Monaco.
text: Spostandoci dal centro di Marienplatz e nn lontano dal Palazzo residenziale, che consiglio di visitare, si estende il meraviglioso giardino inglese. Molto curato attraversato dal fiume e con la presenza di un laghetto, offre dei momenti di relax e di abbronzatura e di attività fisiche a corpo libero a famiglie e bambini. Voglio segnalare la presenza di nudisti che liberamente percorrevano i viali attorno al prato ed al fiume.
visit: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

title: Mutlaka yaret edilmeli
text: Kesinlikle kaçırılmaması gereken bir yer. Müze kadar önemli. Özellikle sıcak havada nehire kendini bırakığ eğlenen insanların enerjisinden siz de bir nebze dozunuzu alın derim. Köprüden suya atlayanlar mı dersiniz. Ayağını ıslayanlar mı, şişme simidi ile yüzenleri mi, içeçeği ile akıntıya kendini bırakanlar mı ... hepsi izlemeye değer. Tavsiyem tramvay (no:16) Haus der Kunst veya Paradiesstrasse durağında inip o girişten girmenizdir. Surfwelle diye haritalarda da geçer.

title: Ben curato
text: Parco molto ben curato pieno di panche se vuoi fermarti e bere una buona birra e in buon brezel. Da visitare

title: No un simple parque para caminar
text: Interesante área de surf, surf en un río dentro de un parque en la ciudad, suena casi irreal pero es una visita obligada.

title: Una scoperta
text: Se si va in estate e si avesse la possibilità di prendersi una giornata libera la visita con un asciugamano per fare il bagno non può mancare. Lo definirei il Central Park du Monaco
visit: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

title: Terrific open space for all within Munich to share.
text: A well maintained and wide ranging open space, with great areas to walk, cycle, stop to drink and eat, including in particular, the Chinese Tower beer garden location.Beware though, alongside some parts of the river, some of the local residents have a propensity to expose themselves, quite literally, by way of an area for nudity! Not really worth looking at to be honest, but be prepared, as you will need to check-in as you move along.Close to the city centre and within easy walking distance, so somewhere well worth visiting.

title: Prachtig park
text: Tijdens 4 dagen München 2 keer bezocht. Eerst alleen in het voorste gedeelte geweest waar men vanaf de Marienplatz in het centrum binnen 10 minuten naar toe loopt. Het was 30 graden die dag en veel lokale bevolking zwom in de aftakkingen van de Isar. Heerlijk om relaxen in de zon en een boek te lezen. De Chinesischer Turm bleek later ook de moeite waard. Deze ligt iets verder door. Een kapel speelt er blaasmuziek en in de biergarten rond de toren kan men door middel van zelfbediening eten en drinken.

title: English Garden year round
text: The English Garden is a little bit of heaven right in the middle of a city of 1.5 million.  I think it is part of what makes Munich feel more like a village.  You see such a mix of residents, tourists, old and young enjoying the park.  There are enough hidden places to feel you have nature all to yourself, or crowded spots to simply sit down and do excellent people watching.  There are the big things that are not to be missed;  surfers on the outer edge of the park, the bridge with the backdrop of lovely small waterfalls, the Chinese turn.  If you can rent a bike to go through, this is the ideal.  Also, every season has something unique to enjoy.  If you are lucky enough to catch it after a snow, bundle up and dive in.  It is breathtaking.

title: A good beer garden place
text: A decent place to enjoy some food and beer. I did not find it very amusing but it is good to relax. It has a good cycling track.

title: Sehr schöne Anlage
text: Der Englische Garten ist wunderbar zum entspannen, man vergisst, dass man mitten in einer Großstadt ist.

title: Look for the surfers
text: I have a confession to make: I only saw a small part of the English garden.  The part I did, see, however, was a lot of fun.  They call it the surfer area.  There is an artificial wave that was created near a bridge.  The surfers take methodical turns catching the waves.  It is fun to watch.

title: Fabuloso parque
text: Pulmón verde de Munich, espectacular para pasar el dia o un rato paseando por el o disfrutando de sus diferentes localizaciones,  sea a pie o en bicicleta , cuenta con locales donde tomar algo o comer
visit: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

title: Oase in der Stadt
text: Wunderschöner platz im Großstadtdschungel, wunderbar zum Relaxen und Erholen. Für Getränke und Speisen,sorgen die Biergärten am Chinesischen Turm

title: Bosco in città
text: Nonostante il nome, si tratta di un vero bosco dentro una delle metropoli d'Europa...ideale per passeggiate in bici e con il cane, i giochi per bimbi sono spartani ma ben tenuti, in stile Europa del nord. Non venite qui per vedere aiuole fiorite, ma per sport, immergersi nella natura e bere una buona birra con vista pagoda cinese!

title: Un verdadero relax en medio de Múnich.
text: Ayer tuvimos un día de paseo desde la mañana bien temprano y en la tarde nada mejor que poder descansar y relajarse en este parque. Tiene unas zonas verdes divinas, pudimos dejar suelto a nuestro perro y el también disfrutar. Hay 2 Biergarten que tienen muchas opciones para comer y por supuesto cerveza.Totalmente recomendable.
visit: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

title: Imperdible
text: El jardín es muy grande, se puede pasar un buen par de horas caminando tranquilamente. Está bien cuidado y tiene zonas muy preciosas. En la torre china hay servicios de comida y cerveza, la cual funciona bien y se agradece si se lleva horas recorriendo el parque.Totalmente recomendado, es un lugar muy tranquilo y bonito.

title: A must see in Munich
text: I’m surprised some of my friends visited Munich and did not visit this park . It is a huge park and the streams of water that the surfers use were very nice to see .

title: Very peaceful, larger than Central Park
text: The English Garden is an absolute must for those visiting Munich! Take a Wegbier and go walk the park. The waterfalls are a must see

title: Visita obligada
text: Visita obligada en Munich, en verano lo usan como playa, muy tranquilo y lindo para sentarse a tomar sol y aire

title: Go and enjoy, its beautiful...
text: It's not far out of the old town, its 5 square kilometres, just amazing. Lots to see, enjoy the walk and relax.

title: Lovely spot to relax
text: Went in August and had good weather the whole time so spent a reasonable amount of time in the park. Would absolutely recommend the Eisbach area in good weather, the surfers are out which is interesting to see and the atmosphere is good for relaxing. Also nice area to walk around fairly close to the centre of the city

title: lovely place to wander and people watch
text: fantastic way to finish off a full days sightseeing by walking through the many paths and watching people swimming in the river or sunbathing by the banks. Thoroughly enjoyable

title: A must in the Summer
text: Just a brief walk from the Marienplatz, its a must to see in the Summer. Free admission, and Name one other park that you can surf ? You Can here. Or do as the locals do, float down the stream and relax, Just make sure you grab the rope before the rapids. Had enough walking ? hire one of the numerous bike taxis. Hungry ? inexpensive fare at the Bier gartens. And of course beer, soda water, Its alot of walking to see it all, Plan a good portion of the day and relax.

title: English garden
text: 1 kilometer wide and 7 kilometers long. This is the largest city park in the world. Three beer gardens. Even if you don’t drink alcohol, the food is worth the stop. The biggest is the one at the Chinese tower. Mostly locals not just a tourist stop.

title: Gorgeous vibrant place
text: A lovely garden with a stream, lake and beautiful dappled light from the treea. The Chinese Turm area has a great beer hall with delicious food (looks much nicer than the one by the lake). Definately worth an afternoon. Lots of locals sunbathing and relaxing. Nice vibe
visit: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

title: Divertimento assicurato
text: Il più grande parco d’Europa, curato, pieno di verde, dove i residenti fanno il bagno sul fiume o praticano il surf. Da girare con i monopattini elettrici è un autentico divertimento. Alla fine, alla birreria della torre cinese, ottima birra. Uscendo dalla torre, bus e coincidenza con U6 metro

title: An einem Sonntag bei herrlichem Sonnenschein wimmelte es von Menschen, aber es kommt keine Hektik auf. Hier kann jeder d
text: An einem Sonntag bei herrlichem Sonnenschein wimmelte es von Menschen, aber es kommt keine Hektik auf. Hier kann jeder den Tag genießen mit und ohne Geld.

title: Perfect for a sunny day
text: Perfect for a stroll on a summer dayIdeal for food and drink too! Lots to see in the park...surfers in the river! Plenty of seatingtoilets are spread out and a donation/charge is requied for use so make sure you have change!

title: Reccomended
text: We had a wander around the park for a few hours and didn’t even get to the very end. We came across 3 beer gardens. Lots of locals of all ages use the park for sunbathing or the beer gardens etc. It’s really beautiful and gets really busy on a nice day over a weekend. Lovely to see everyone enjoying the space

title: Super schön an sonnigen Tagen
text: Haben ganze 6 Stunden den englischen Garten besucht. Viele schöne Stellen.Ich würde den englischen Garten jederzeit wieder besuchen.Diverse Gastronomie für eine kleine Stärkung findet man an etlichen Stellen.
visit: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

title: Posto incantevole e rilassante
text: Sono andato a questo bellissimo parco ad Agosto 2019, ho noleggiato una bici ed ho pedalato per km senza pensare a niente godendomi la natura da cui ero circondato. Cura massima del parco e rispetto verso il prossimo è la chiave per una giornata rilassante!

title: Meraviglioso
text: Avere un parco del genere nella propria città è un'immensa fortuna. Aree verdi dove lasciar correre i cani o dove sedersi per rilassarsi. È uno dei parchi più grandi del mondo. Assolutamente da scoprire.
visit: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

title: E... CHE PARCO!!!!!!!
text: Parco elegante.Ci si può divertire facendo surf o nuotando direttamente nel fiume che scorre al suo interno.C'è anche un'ampia zona ristoro dove poter mangiare pasti portati da casa o usufruire della loro area self service.Giornata relax garantita.

title: It's really perfect when it rains. I've never seen so much beauty before.
text: It's really perfect when it rains. I've never seen so much beauty before. I like. Exactly come place

title: İt rain I love
text: How can you be happy when it rains like this. Go here, you know. A very nice place. A place full of green and peace. I'm always happy when I go.

title: Imperdible en visita a Munich
text: Hermosisimo !! Para cenar o almorzar junto al lago. Buenos restaurantes con variedad de precios. Especial para caminar en  plan romántico o familiar vale la pena visitarlo. También para hacer yoga, montar en bici o simplemente caminar

title: Basically an English style park.
text: Not sure where the Garden part comes from but it is very much like the kind of Park you find in England, however much bigger than the parks of most English towns.   Nice greenspace for a long walk around the City.

title: Druk op een zonnige dag
text: Het was warm, het was weekend en dus druk. Maar ontzettend leuk om door dit grote park te lopen. Er zwommen veel mensen in het stevig stromende water. Alhoewel dit volgens mij niet helemaal de bedoeling is. Wel leuk om te zien. Mooi aangelegd. Gezellige sfeer rondom de centraal gelegen Chinese toren. Aldaar een biergarten. Wel wat dure versnaperingen ter plaatse, maar dat mocht de pret niet drukken.
visit: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

title: Stupendo
text: Stupendo giardino nel cuore di Monaco, ben organizzato e pulito. Girarlo a piedi è impossibile in un giorno. Tutto perfetto

title: Bellissima passeggiata
text: L’Englischer Garten è forse una delle “attrazioni” più belle di Monaco. È enorme: al suo interno si possono trovare monumenti, edifici storici e la famosa “Onda”, dove surfisti da tutto il mondo si ritrovano durante tutto il periodo dell’anno! Il giardino è ideale per una lunga passeggiata dopo aver pranzato. Consigliatissima la visita!
visit: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

title: outside stay
text: nice walking around the English Garden on a sunday. lots of people but still not too crowded. live bavarian music at the chinese Tower.

title: Splendido e pittoresco
text: Giardino meraviglioso in Monaco. Una scoperta continua dal piccolo fiume dove fanno il bagno con disinvoltura. Ragazzi che fanno il surf alle chiuse del fiume  Famiglie intere in bici, a passeggio. Vi è un lago dove si naviga con piccole imbarcazioni. E una piccola piazzetta con centinaia di tavoli e una birreria. Assolutamente da vedere.

title: Great spot for a picnic
text: Great spot for a picnic and also worth chugging a few beers at the beer garden late evening. The river surfing is a must see.

title: Bello, bello, bello!!
text: Abbiamo passeggiato in questo giardino di domenica mattina. È stato molto bello passeggiare nel verde curato e ammirare il panorama dalla collinetta con il tempio "Monopteros". Consigliato!
visit: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

title: Beautiful garden
text: Take a stroll... beautiful!Find the surfers and nude sunbathers.Feed the ducks.Lovely afternoon in Munich.

title: true nature
text: English Garden is huge! You walk, and walk and walk and all you see is green grass, tall trees, you fell that you are in a forest, not a park. People rent bikes, walk, have picnic, or just walk their dog. It’s amazing! Very clean and well maintained.There is also a big lake and a river where people go surfing. We spend around 3 hours and a half here and we trully enjoyed it. Congratulations Munich!

title: Parco in città
text: Ottimo per una rilassante passeggiata o per un giro in bici Parco cittadino immenso facilmente raggiungibile anche con i mezzi pubblici

title: Wunderschöner Park
text: Eine wunderschöne Parkanlage und Treffpunkt für jung und alt. Sowohl für kleines wie auch grosses Portmonee geeignet (Picknick, Gastronomie oder einfach nur entspannen)

title: Bel giardino dove rilassarsi
text: Fate una passeggiata in questo bellissimo parco dove potrete rilassarvi e fare incontri con le papere attraverso i ponticelli...e nel giardino giapponese per l'occasione abbiamo visto una geisha che faceva un book fotografico
visit: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

title: Huge
text: Went here to visit the Chinese tower beer garden not realising the size of the park. Plan ahead if you're looking to go to a particular part and use transport links.
visit: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

title: Beautiful & huge
text: Visited 2 weeks ago.Last minute decision.Was surprised how huge it is for a city Centre park.Wasnt overcrowded at all.Quite a few well behaved dogs & cyclists.Spent the whole day here & loved it.A must if visiting Munich.

title: Garden
text: I’m not a fan of gardens actually! Because I like activities more than seating and watch trees 😬but this garden is different it’s was huge and beautiful and there's the area for children to play  🙏🏻I think that I love it 😂❤️

title: Io lo adoro
text: Parco immenso, curato come un giardino privato, praticamente in centro ma che ti fa dimenticare di essere in città, la natura ti avvolge e ti rende sereno. La passeggiata, la sosta alla pagoda o al laghetto, sono tutte occasioni per trascorrere piacevoli ore nella natura.

title: Beautiful place to chill & relax
text: Beautiful place to just take a break from the city. Peaceful and relaxing!!Good for people watching, strolling around and going thru the city away from traffic!

title: Immenso polmone verde
text: L'Englischer Garten è uno dei più grandi parchi pubblici urbani del mondo, più vasto del celebre Central Park di New York.Ci si può passare un'intera giornata, in bicicletta o a piedi, rilassandosi sull'erba tenuta alla perfezione. Da vedere il surf fluviale!

title: Schöne Parkanlage inmitten der Stadt
text: Sehenswerte und schön angelegte Parkanlage. Zum Spazierengehen mit Kinderwagen ideal. Direkt am Eingang im Süden des Parks ist die Eisbachwelle, wo man entspannt den Surfern zusehen kann. Faszinierend fanden wir die vielen Menschen, die in der Isar badend stromabwärts getrieben sind. Es sah nach viel Spaß und einer guten Abkühlung aus.Etwas negativ aufgefallen ist uns, dass es im ganzen Park kaum öffentliche Toiletten gab.Geparkt haben wir in unmittelbarer Nähe in der Lerchenfeldstraße für 1,00 Euro/Stunde. Wahnsinnig günstig, wer die Hamburger Parkpreise kennt. Im Vorfeld haben wir uns die App "Handyparken" von der Stadt München heruntergeladen, sodass wir ganz bequem und entspannt ohne Kleingeld, Ticket in der Frontscheibe und auf die Uhr gucken durch den Park schlendern konnten.

title: A highlight of Munich
text: We found this to be a great urban park. It is close to the downtown core and a break from all the noise of the city. The trails are well kept and easy to walk on, the trees and flora are magnificent, and there are cafes and beer gardens when thirsty. There is also a unique spot to watch river surfing!
visit: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

title: Ein großer Park zum entspannen
text: Hier kann man gut spazieren gehen sich ausruhen und Energie tanken. Der englische Garten ist riesig und bekannt für seine Eisbachwelle, den chinesischen Turm und viele weitere Sehenswürdigkeiten

title: Sempre maravilhoso!
text: O Jardim Inglês, ou Englischer Garten, em Munique, é um dos maiores parques urbanos do mundo, maior até que o Central Park de Nova Iorque, com cerca de 4,17 km quadrados, cuja construção foi ideia de Benjamin Thompson, em 1789. Lá, você encontra de tudo: se quiser apenas descansar, usufrua dos verdes gramados! Se sua preferência é surfar, é só ficar na fila e aguardar sua vez, porque a concorrência pelo esporte é grande! Mas vai valer a pena! Se for apenas caminhar, andar de bicicleta, brincar com seu cãozinho, também é possível! Está com crianças? Tem parquinhos prá elas! Ah! Quer um delicioso sorvete, ou comer,  ou beber aquela cerveja bávara? Sem problema! Tem!!! Olha, o melhor é vir e descobrir tudo o que esse lugar maravilhoso oferece e é de graça!!!

title: Lugar tranquilo
text: Enorme jardín en plena ciudad de Munich al cual le atraviesa su río isar. Esplanadas enormes de césped o zonas de sombra con grandes árboles así como también se puede estar a la vera del río tomándose una buena cerveza y también con lugares de interés dentro para poder visitar y al inicio del río ver a jóvenes surfeando en un pequeño salto de agua. Muy recomendable.
visit: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

title: Bellissimo
text: Bellissimo ed enorme parco (più grandi di Centrl Park a NYC) nel centro della cittàAssolutamente da visitare a piedi, in bici o con i monopattini elettriciDa vedere il River Surfing, molto particolareDopo una bella passeggiata è doverosa una sosta al biergarten alla Chinesischen Turm

title: Una maravilla
text: Es difícil de comparar, una mezcla entre el Retiro de Madrid y la Casa de Campo, podías ver a la gente reunida, tanto joven como familias. Su diversión en agosto que estuvimos, era tirarse al río en grupos de 10-15 y dejarse llevar por la corriente. También puedes ver cómo surfean en una ola improvisada en el rio, además de tomar algo en alguna Biergarten de la que destaco la Pagoda China donde puedes comer y/o beber, amenizado por la música de una pequeña banda

title: Pulmón verde y... surf!
text: Surf en plena ciudad en un canal en el que sale el agua con muchísima corriente y en el que avezados surfers deleitan a los turistas y paseantes con sus habilidades. Es una singularidad de este bonito y agradable parque en el centro de Múnich.

title: Leuk
text: Leuk park, surfersgolf is indrukwekkend (weliswaar niet zo makkelijk te vinden). Biergarten is leuk, maar niet zo goedkoop. We waren er op een warme dag en toch waren er verschillende dingen niet verkrijgbaar.
visit: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

title: 很大
text: 很大，在里面跑步、骑车者甚多，空气清新，从西门出来是慕尼黑大学，无论是住房，还是教学楼都很整洁、干净。尤其是大学十分宏伟气派。

title: Herrliche Location
text: Sehr schön gelegen. Exzellente Küche. Erstklassiger Service....sehr aufmerksam und freundlich. Alles sehr sauber.

title: Un parc urbain des plus agréables
text: Ce parc immense, en plein cœur de la ville, est particulièrement agréable. On s'y pose tranquillement, sur les pelouses ou attablés à un biergarten. Pour les plus intrépides, il est possible de se baigner dans le canal, voire d'y surfer.

title: Wonderful great oasis in the city
text: The English garden is a huge parkland in the middle of the city, whilst it can get busy along some of the riverside sections where people swim, surf, sunbathe and children paddle it is easy to find a place of solitude. Seated eating  and drinking opportunities are available, plus ice cream vendors. A wonderful place to people watch. We got off the underground at “Universtat” and it was a short walk from there .
visit: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

title: Excellent Park
text: This park is an excellent walk, not too far from City Centre - Beer Garden with live music is great.  Make new friends here too.

title: Wunderbar zum Entspannen und Genießen
text: Der Besuch des Englischen Gartens während eines München-Besuchs ist einfach ein "Muß". Abseits des Trubels einer Großstadt und doch mittendrin kann man bei ausgedehnten Spaziergängen, z.B. rund um den Kleinhesseloher See, oder einfach nur auf einer Bank oder unter einem Baum sitzend abschalten, Ruhe finden und die frische Luft genießen. Die Anlage ist sehr gepflegt und bietet zahlreiche sehr schöne Fotomotive. Mehrfach wöchentlich wird man am Chinesischen Turm mit Blasmusik begrüßt und kann dort bei einer Brotzeit in die Atmosphäre des wohl größten Biergartens eintauchen.

title: Molto rilassante
text: Merita una passeggiata questo splendido parco al centro della città dove si possono praticare attività insolite come il surf o una nuotata nei canali o semplicemente una passeggiata in bici,

title: Immer schön
text: Auch wenn die Nackerten mittlerweile einfach nur noch Übriggebliebene sind, ist der Englische Garten einfach wunderschön und durch die Gewässer eine angenehme Abwechslung zur Schickeria...

title: Wonderful day in the English Garden in Munich
text: It is a great park to spend a lazy afternoon. But also for a good long walk and to enjoy a nice beer near the Chinese house.

title: Bel parco
text: Bel parco da visitare a piedi o in bici! Bello vedere i surfisti, giocare a pallone i semplicemente starsene sdraiati all'ombra.

title: Münchener müsste man sein!
text: Wenn man den Englischen Garten in München besucht, einen der größten innerstädtischen Parks der Welt, dann kann man schon neidisch werden auf die Menschen, die diese tolle Parkanlage vor ihrer Türe haben! Bei einem Spaziergang, im Biergarten unterm chinesischen Turm oder am Kleinhesseloher See, auf der Liegewiese oder auf einer Bank unter großen Bäumen kann man herrlich entschleunigen.An einem Sonntag bei herrlichem Sonnenschein wimmelte es von Menschen, aber es kommt keine Hektik auf. Hier kann jeder den Tag genießen mit und ohne Geld. Interessant war es, den Surfern auf der Eisbachwelle zuzuschauen.Unvergleichlich, wie man am Chinesischen Turm mit Blasmusik begrüßt wird (auch wenn man kein Blasmusik-Fan ist), aber das Bier schmeckt einfach noch einmal so gut!Schnell ist man wieder im Stadtgebiet. Meine Empfehlung: Mit der U-Bahn zur Station "Lehel" fahren und dann einfach Richtung Norden laufen.Uns hat es super gefallen dort!

title: Bellissimo
text: Bellisimo parco, enorme, con un sacco di attività da fare, compreso il surf!Se andate a Monaco non dimenticate di passarci almeno mezza giornata

title: Il grande polmone verde di Monaco
text: Il parco è grandissimo con delle particolarità: c'è una pagoda cinese, in alto della quale suona una banda e in basso la gente mangia e beve birra, in una parte del parco, nelle belle giornate di sole in estate, la gente si mette in costume e fa il bagno nei ruscelli, in uno dei quali, quello ondoso, c'è chi fa surf.

title: What a place!
text: Absolutely loved this treasure. If you love dogs this is the place to be, we also managed to ‘pub crawl” our way around the beer houses and enjoyed a ride on a pedalo for half an hour. Beautiful place with so much to do. Perfect picnic spot and suitable for all ages.
visit: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

title: Giardini meravigliosi
text: Giardini splendidi. Ben tenuti. Girateli in bici. Il fiume che li attraversa è proprio suggestivo. Fateci un pic nic con i vostri figli.

title: Ein Muss für Münchenbesuch
text: Auf jeden Fall dort die münchene Luft tanken und Lebensart kennenlernen. Der englischer Garten ist größer als Central park in Neu York. Deshalb reicht nur zu Fuß gehen nicht um alles anzuschauen. Wir haben dann ein Fahrradtaxi 38€ 30 min gemietet und mit dabei eine kleine Führung mitgebucht. Man kann dort z.B. Fahrrad oder E-scooter mieten und selber fahren.

title: Green Space
text: Fabulous park, albeit very busy when weather is fine. Worth checking out the surfers in the Eisbach.

title: Meraviglia
text: Il parco offre nstira,prari,boschi,lago e il fiume balneabile.Se avete fortuna con il tempo vi divertirete.Poi bei posti ristoro

title: Baya başarılı
text: Münihe geldiyseniz buraya mutlaka uğrayın. O kadar büyük o kadar sakin o kadar huzur dolu bir yer ki delireceksiniz. İçeride bira ve domuz eti satan işletmeler var. Ucuz miktarlara bunları tüketebilirsiniz.

title: svalka och lummighet
text: Vacker park att promenera i med höga gamla träd och floden Isar som flyter igenom den. Var dock uppmärksam på att vissa av gångvägarna även är till för cyklister som kan komma i hög hastighet. Här finns dessutom ett par Biergarten.

title: Un vero incanto
text: Un grande polmone di verde per Monaco! Sembra quasi di stare in campagna, ma poi ti ricordi che sei venuto in metro. Incredibilmente piacevole
visit: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

title: Wonderful park
text: Visited here on recent trip to Munich during very hot weather! Huge lovely park with fantastic river running through it in which if you are young enough you can jump in to and get carried way downstream by the current which hundreds of people were doing....just not me!! Beer Garden in middle of park fantastic. You have to go for the litre glass!!

title: Beautiful gadren
text: Great view. Good for family to spend time togerher.  Especially the sunrise is pretty and romantic !!!

title: Wonderful garden
text: The green lung in the middle of MunchenThe park is huge and very pleasant even though I have not understood why it was called ‘English ‘A river travels across its length and dogs jump into it happily There are several beer gartens or restaurant A wonderful place to spend away a sunny afternoon

title: Brilliant day out
text: We hired bikes at Mike's Bikes and hit the park on a day with 32 degree temps, and we had a ball. Stopped off at the beer gardens for beer and pretzels every now and again, watched the surfers and all the locals treating it like a beach. Do get out of park for lunch (beer gardens are limited with food). We left from the left side of the lake and found a fab area with lots of little restaurants and bars - we ate in Souxe Meze Greek restaurant and had fab lunch. Love it.

title: Un vrai bol d'air au cœur d'une grande ville !
text: En famille, nous avons passé une journée a Munich ! Quelle joie de pouvoir se promener dans ces grands espaces de verdure, d'arbres. A quelques centaines de mètres de la ville, nous observons des fleurs, des écureuils, des oiseaux. Reposant !

title: Fantastic Park
text: A huge open space which it seemed the locals were all enjoying to relax doing whatever they wanted, even nude sunbathing. The surfers in the eisbach are a must see, really cool. Would be good to use bikes or scooters here.

title: Bellissimo
text: Distese immense di giardini perfettamente curati dove poter passeggiare con i bimbi piccoli o grandi che siano. E poi di tanto in tanto questi “chioschi” con giochi per i più piccoli e punti di ristoro organizzatissimi e con tanto cibo e tanta birra. Per passare una bellissima giornata di relax!!!

title: Surprenant
text: En arrivant dans ce poumon vert de Munich nous sommes initialement tombé sur un spot de surfer...... incroyable après nous vous conseillons d'aller déguster une bière aux alentours de la tour chinoise une véritable incursion dans la vie munichoise.
visit: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

title: Gran parque urbano
text: Precioso parque donde puedes encontrar gente tomando el sol (incluso haciendo nudismo), surfistas en unas olas creadas en el río, una Cervera con mesas en el parque y muy buen ambiente.
visit: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

title: Große grüne Lunge im Herzen von MUC
text: Alles vorhanden. Surfer im Eiskanal, grüne Wiesen, alter Baumbestand, Monopterus, der Chinesische Turm, Biergarten, Blasmusik.

title: Relax
text: Einfach dem großen Dorf entfliehen und sich treiben lassen und schöne Blicke genießen am Eisbach bei den Surfern beste Unterhaltung

title: Relax and enjoy the beauty
text: What a delightful and relaxing time at this lovely park!  If you go don’t miss the surfers, yep they were surfing and going down the river ... fun. Games, sunbathing, walking, biking... the park has it all.  Oh there is a beer garden at the Chinese tower.  Enjoy!

title: Il polmone verde di Monaco
text: Il giardino è molto grande, si gira molto bene a piedi o in bicicletta. Al suo interno, oltre agli sconfinati spazi verdi ed ai boschi, sono presenti la torre cinese, con un grande Biergarten, la zona per surfare sul fiume, il Monopteros (anche se purtroppo l'ho trovato molto sporco) e diversi laghetti artificiali. Consiglio vivamente una visita, soprattutto se si è a Monaco durante il periodo estivo dell'anno.

title: Vergelijk met central park is meer dan terecht
text: Prachtig park met bossen, grasvelden, waterpartijen waar je kan varen. Mooie wandelpaden, biergarten en heel wat vertier.zwemmen en zonnen, fietsen ....alles kan . Ontspannend

title: Espectacular
text: Parque dentro de la ciudad donde llegas con el metro. Tiene muchas hectareas de cesped para poder tomar el sol, tumbarte, jugar.... llegas al lago donde hay patos y cisnes. Puedes coger un patinete o barca y recorrerlo. Hay zonas para poder tomarte una cerveza o otra bebida. Vale la pena visitarlo.

title: Una bella mattinata a ferragosto!
text: Parco immenso, che in alcuni punti sembra quasi un bosco. È un posto meraviglioso, che vale la pena visitare
visit: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

title: Felice sorpresa
text: Abbiamo (io, moglie e 3 figli) visitato questo grande parco per vedere i surfisti! Il parco richiama davvero i grandi parchi londinesi (da cui il nome) e viene attraversato da alcuni corsi d’acqua? Nella parte sud vicino all’ingresso est si possono vedere i surfisti che a turno cavalcano un onda statica. Sono davvero molto bravi. Mai avrei creduto di riuscire a vedere gente surfare a Monaco.

title: Erholung pur mitten in der Stadt
text: Ein echtes Juwel für die ganze Stadt, ein großer Park mit vielen Freizeitmöglichkeiten, guten Restaurants und diversen Kiosken, die so alles bieten, was man fürs leibliche Wohl braucht. Besonders trendig der Kleinhesseloher See, der Chinesische Turm und der Monopterus!

title: Passeggiata nel verde
text: Immenso parco, perfetto per essere girato in bici, immancabile le tappe in uno dei tipici chioschi sempre presenti con birra e cibo bavarese. Merita assolutamente anche il giro in barca nel laghetto (10 euro per 30 minuti, a scelta tra pedalò e barca a remi).
visit: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

title: Magnifique endroit de verdure en plein centre
text: Vous cherchez un havre de paix aux ambiances différentes....Allez-y. Du simple coin de verdure, aux magnifiques vues sur les lacs...Footing, vélo, balade...vous avez le choix !A faire impérativement sur Munich !

title: Wunderschöner Park
text: Sehr schöner Park mit See, mit vielen Biergärten, toll zum spazieren, relaxen, einfach zum geniessen.

title: روووعه
text: فيها تحسن بالطبيعة والثلج ونظافة المكان وسهولة والوصول لها ونقاوة الجو وفيها ممارسة رياضة المشي والدراجة

title: Bellissimo
text: Mi ha meravigliato positivamente,immenso,d'estate è possibile fare il bagno,bellissima la zona ristorante vicino alla pagoda cinese
visit: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

title: Un giga parc
text: Nous l’avons fait sous quelques averses malheureusement mais il y a de quoi faire des kilomètres ! Parc très bien entretenu, de belles oies et canards. Dommage qu’il n’ait pas intégré des mini fermes, chevaux.... Faire de la barque ou du pédalo est très chouette. Le bus 68 qui y va permet de visiter la ville.

title: Beautiful view! Perfect for hot day
text: Atmosphere there was great ! The day I visited English garden was on Sunday so I was able to see lot of people around. The narrow river inside the gardens I found quite amusing. It was fun watching people swimming and surfing in that small river. Park is green and lots of shade so it’s nice to bring a picnic blanket, food and beverages and chill out for few hours. I was visiting it on my own but even people watching was quite amusing! And not to mention that beer garden at the beginning of the park is quite good.

title: The Surfers
text: The best of the English Garden was the surfers. I really enjoyed watching them surf in the canal. They were so good.

title: Great place to stroll
text: Nice park to relax, picnic, and walk around. Lots of different interesting buildings as well as a surfing wave in the river.

title: Absolutely beautiful!
text: We were lucky to have good weather while visiting here - super relaxing and fun vibe. In the summer you can swim in the river. Massive park that has lovely walking tracks. Highly recommended
visit: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

title: Paradise in the City
text: We took the U bahn and got off at the University stop and walked right into the park from there on a beautiful summer day.  We enjoyed floating in the chilly river, but this was one of the reasons we came to Munich so we did it!  Plenty to see with some men very comfortable walking around naked, boy did my teen age girls get a lesson, but again it is Europe! Just watch out for rocks on the bottom, keep your feet up!  We also meant bikes one day near that same entrance behind the beer garden.  They were bikes with a bit of an extra battery pack to go faster so we were able to see most of the park in a couple of hours, it is HUGE.  My daughters enjoyed watching the surfers the most!

title: very relaxing
text: very  relaxing garden with open beer garden restaurants, swimming and water surfing places, rowboat renting and more.Fine place in summer heat.

title: A Big Park, Not a Garden
text: The English Garden is a misleading name as it is really a very big park with a lake, streams, lots of geese and ducks, cafes, restaurants and an area of fast flowing water where you can watch surfers practising.  It was fairly disappointing as the name gives the impression of flower gardens, borders and something to admire and take an interest in.  It's really big so you can have a very long walk if you want and there are plenty of places to sunbathe and paddle in the streams, but it's definitely not a garden!

title: Che passeggiata!
text: Bellissimo polmone verde nel cuore di Monaco di Baviera... sicuramente da visitare per una pausa rilassante... consiglio di andare al centro del parco per pranzare dove c'è una Torre cinese... sotto questa torre cinese vi sono tantissimi tavoli in legno dove è possibile bere e mangiare a poco prezzo...!

title: Beautiful garden in the city of Munich
text: I enjoyed walking through the gardens during my trip to Munich. It was a cool autumn day with good sunlight. Very relaxing visit.

title: Large park with a large beer garden and plenty of space to relax
text: Don't miss the surfing on the river. Be aware that you can bump into  the odd nudist when the sun is out.

title: Un posto magico
text: Un parco immenso, pieno di verde che ti consente di intrattenerti in ogni modo possibile;facendo un pic nic, rilassandoti grazie alle vaste aree. Da provare lo street food che si tiene attorno alla torre giapponese ti consente di immergerti a pieno nella coltura bavarese. Lo consiglio come attività da fare la domenica.

title: MAGIC PLACE
text: Un’immensa macchia  di verde ,c’è qualsiasi forma di svago, tante aree per rilassarsi ,stendersi e fare un semplice pic nic,da provare  sopratutto  lo street food attorno  alla torre giapponese  riesci a fonderti a pieno nell’aria bavarese,consigliato come attività di domenica

title: schöner Spaziergang
text: Wir konnten den „englischen Garten“ bei sehr schönem Wetter kennen lernen. Es sind feine Spazierwege vorhanden und man kann die schön angelegten Wege erkunden. Besuch gehört in München sicherlich zu einem Muss.
visit: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

title: Meraviglioso
text: Stupendo, una vera oasi cittadina. Da non perdere, anche per un giro in bici o sosta pic nic. E l’angolo dei surfisti è quasi surreale. Atmosfera easy life!

title: Abkühlung in der Sommerhitze mitten in München
text: Sehr lohnenswert ein Besuch des englischen Gartens in München. Auch mit Kinder und Jugendlichen. Umgeben von zahlreichen Gaststätten und Museen. Auch die sehr belebte Shoppingmeile „Leopoldstraße“ ist wenige Meter entfernt.

title: 크고 산책하기 좋은 녹지
text: 많은 독일인들이 좋은 날씨일 때 이 곳에 와서 피크닉을 보내는 것 같습니다그 모습을 보면 제 몸과 마음도 즐거워집니다새들도 많고 주변으로 잘 다가오는 게 여간 귀여운 게 아닙니다

title: Un lugar para pasear
text: Es un parque con una especio de recorrido de rio, donde te puedes bañar y hay gente incluso haciendo Surf en una zona.Tienen Biergarden para tomar una cerveza o comer al aire libre

title: Lunghissima passeggiata
text: Un bellissimo parco nel cuore di Monaco, dove si respira area pulita e silenzio! Scarpe comode e dedicate tanto tempo a questo posto!
visit: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

title: Très original
text: Parc très grand avec possibilité de se reposer, de se baigner, mais attention l’eau est très froide.

title: A must walk!!!
text: Easy to access, this huge garden is right in the center of Munich and offers a buffer for every local and tourist to visit and enjoy. On week ends it gets packed by local families that enjoy with pic nic and even bathing in the many rivers that cross the park. There is also a surfers corner, a must see!!!!

title: What a super real German experience.
text: The Chinese Tower in the middle of the park is easy to find. Beneath is a German beer garden- one of the highlights of our trip. There is so much choice - sausages, pasta, noodles, meatloaf, chips etc. As well as huge glasses of beer: including non alcoholic, shandy and soft drinks. Not cheap but excellent fun. Choose your dishes and drinks then pay on exit. Even live music coming from the tower. What could be better?

title: Balade en famille
text: Une belle découverte, un parc immense, et le plaisir d'y trouver des beergarten, c'est de l'authenticité et rien de plus. Très bel endroit

title: Very good experience
text: Our group of 8 american adults enjoyed the experience. Fortunately we had a German speaker, who knew we needed to self serve beer and food.  Prices were not any higher than other restaurants. Food  was good, beer great. Gelato absolutely delicious. €1.50\scoop. Extra bonus: Band was playing in pagoda! Not too crowded when we were there, 4-5pm. Many open tables.
visit: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

title: Beautiful - don’t miss the surfing!
text: Our visit in the park started with a stop at the surf spot, ”surfing the Eisenbach”. Really cool! We are not surfers but enjoyed watching so stayed for a bit. Then we started walking the south part and the rain was pouring down. Still beautiful and almost empty of people so we got some nice photos. A great place to just stroll around. Only thing missing is more public restrooms.
visit: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

title: Çok güzel
text: Her yer göz alabildiğine yemyeşil. Üstünüzden yaban kazları ( ördek de olabilir) uçuyor. 3 km karelik bir alan. Aslında Münih yeşillikler şehri. Binaların boyunu aşan ağaçlar her tarafta. Hem tarihi dokuyu hem yeşili korumuşlar.

title: Cross the bridge to escape the crowds.
text: Very beautiful place to explore by bike. We rented from MucBike which is next to the entrance closest to the university. The main part is very crowded, but if you cross the bridge over the highway, the are becomes ideal for bicycling.

title: Runs, floating, relaxing
text: Great spot with so many different trails and spots for different activities.As mostly a runner there, the trails are fantastic and you can get great circuits throughout without getting bored or feeling trapped. Great balance of shade and sun for different weather patters.Great spot on a really hot day as there are heaps of spots by the streams to either dunk in or float, a popular pass time for locals either on small inflatables or just lying on their backs. As large as it is, you never feel crammed, even on weekend sunny days.Also so many spots for sports and other activities on the many lawns. Beer gardens are either within the park or right by it, making it easy to have a typical German experience.Not as many washrooms without having to walk further and not really any water fountains. Tough for longer runs in hot weather, though there are kiosks for buying water (not ideal though).If you're lucky you may see a true local on a warm summers day strolling naked after a good float on the stream.

title: Un bellissimo parco!
text: Anche l’ho visitato in serata dopo cena devo ammettere che è uno dei parchi pubblici più belli e piacevoli dove sono mai stato, ricco di scorci suggestivi è molto curato e pulito, attraversato del fiume Isar è facilissimo incontrare cigni, papere ed oche. Al suo interno ci sono anche due dei più grandi biergarten di Monaco dove potersi fermare a mangiare e bere.

title: Piacevole scoperta
text: Tra i più grandi parchi urbani del mondo, il Garten è davvero bello da vedere e visitare! Curatissimo, pulito e con le papere e i cigni che, abituate all’uomo, ti passano accanto senza paura! Ha due biergarten enormi all’interno e il fiume che, in un punto, offre la possibilità di fare surf! Lo abbiamo visto in serata e anche alle 22 è frequentato perché molto sicuro.

title: Bellissimo nonostante la pioggia
text: Nonostante la pioggia ci siamo visitati una grande parte di questo parco immenso, utilizzando i monopattini elettrici e mangiando in un ristorante tipico al centro del parco... Molto particolare vedere i ragazzi che facevano surf sui fiumi che lo attraversano
visit: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

title: Munich must see sight
text: The vibrancy of this place was simply mesmerizing. The garden is large and a meeting point for virtually the whole of Munich. If you draw energy from crowds then this will absolutely get you pumped, but equally, if you're more of the in-touch with nature but introverted, you can just as easily find plenty of quiet spots to hangout. Went for beer at the beer garden inside the English garden - was a little disappointed by the limited variety, but the vibe and the good company of friends more than made up for it.

title: Grüne Oase in der Stadt
text: Ist unbedingt einen Besuch wert. Riesiges Areal am Rande der Innenstadt.Eisbachwelle ist kleiner als vermutet, trotzdem den Surfern zusehen. Das Jausenangebot am Chinesischen Turm ist umfangreich, aber auch sehr hochpreisig.

title: Un central park a Monaco
text: Enorme, verde e fresco sono sono alcune delle caratteristiche di questo parco... Nauta, laghi, fiumi, ristoranti e gelaterie si uniscono in una perfetta unione.Ottimo luogo per passeggiate e per godersi il verde.
visit: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

title: Perfect escape from the heat
text: It’s the biggest park in Munich, where we can watch the famous canal where the brave surf on the waters. There’s plenty of space for riding a bike, beer and relaxing. It’s a must see of Munich in the summer!

title: Idéal par belle journée chaude!
text: Nous avons parcouru le parc à pieds regrettant de ne pas avoir réservé de vélos, possible pas très loin du lac, il fallait le savoir,chose faite avec cet avis. Le Biergarten à côté de la tour chinoise est parfait pour apprécier la bière et la gastronomie locale. Ne pas.louper les démos de surf, vaut le détour !

title: Beautiful Large Gardens
text: These gardens have everything you need, swimmable rivers, abundant green space, beer gardens, it’s simpler the best use of public space I have seen, well done Munich.
visit: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

title: Surfing in the city
text: Yes, surfing in Munich.  The garden was beautiful to see, surfing made it interesting and our rickshaw driver made our adventure through the park amazing.

title: A breeze of fresh air in the middle of the city
text: A very pleasant park where we enjoy the pure air for a refreshing walk! What a great start to a productive day!

title: Chinese biergarten!
text: The Chinese biergarten iin the middle of the park should be high on your list of places to hit while visiting Munich. And definitely go check out the surfing at the far southern end of the park!
visit: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

title: Lindo parque urbano
text: A cidade em si já é um parque, mas o English Garten é surpreendente , estive no verão e o cidadão comum de Munique vai desfrutar do rio,ah eles fazem nudismo, e das prainhas de pedra ao redor. Lindas trilhas, com estrutura, um belo passeio

title: Beautiful!!!!!
text: I LOVE green spaces in the middle of urban cities!!!! Connecting with nature soothes the body and soul! The English Garden delivers beauty, tranquility and a most awesome biergarten!!! The grounds are well kept and there are so many different paths to explore!! The green River tributaries add such calmness and beauty to the landscape! The beer garden is exceptional.... big, clean, orderly and the food is yummy. The only things missing are MORE floral displays ( please!!!) and more signage. The park is HUGE! It would be nice to know where you are or where you’re going. And adding more flowers would enhance the parks beauty!!!
visit: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

title: Mükemmel
text: Girer girmez mutlaka bisiklet kiralayıp mümkün mertebe bisikletle gezin. Yürümek için çok büyük ve çok yorucu.

title: Paseo por el parque
text: Es un parque muy bello , para nadar en el río, o comer  o  Picknick tomar una cerveza oyendo música de Bayern . Es una visita obligada cuando se visita münchen .

title: 散歩に
text: 広々とした庭園は、地図がなければ迷ってしまいそう。犬の散歩をする人やジョギングをする人、芝生に寝転び昼寝する人、それぞれに楽しんでいる。暑い日も影に入り風に吹かれていると心地よい。
visit: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

title: Desconexion
text: El parque es enorme y precioso , recomiendo alquilar bici para poder visitarlo , ya que es muy grande.Tiene un lago y bastantes parques infantiles.Hay una zona muy curiosa que hacen surf, vale la pena verlo.Se puede bañar, con días de calor hay bastante gente

title: A fabulous way to while away a sunny afternoon in Munich
text: Make sure you go watch the surfers!  Yes!  Surfers in Munich! and wander over to the China Tower biergarten for a beer and chat with locals

title: A relaxed day
text: If you visiting Munich you should go to English garden , it’s a beautiful forest or huge natural park with a beautiful lake Young kids under 7 enjoyed a lot , different restaurants available and you can rent a bicycle and have a great day there Make sure you don’t miss it

title: Gorgeous
text: I had a meeting at the university and I had an uber drop me off on the northern side of the gardens so that I could enjoy a leisurely walk down to the campus. Really gorgeous and peaceful in early July -- hard to believe it was in downtown Munich. The green did my soul good. Be sure to check out the surfers.

title: Без пива
text: Прогулялся по центру и в условиях лимита пребывания в Мюнхене заглянул сюда...все понравилось...природа...тишина и тренировки водных слаломистов...

title: Beautiful!
text: A lovely stroll along the water and away from the hustle and bustle of the city.  Loved watching the surfers on the rapids, and the ducks on the calm waters.  Inadvertently wandered onto a nude “beach,” but even that added to the fun.  Great day!

title: Hier hat jeder Platz zum entspannen
text: Hier ist es wirklich toll. Nur ein paar Meter von der Innenstadt findet jeder hier Erholung und Entspannung. Gesplegter riesengroße Parkanlagen für groß und klein. Viele Biergärten und gutes Essen findet man hier reichlichüber typisch bayrische Spezialitäten sowie Hausmanskost. Mir hat es am besten an den wilden Gewässern wo die Menschen surfen. Wirklich beeindruckend und sollte jeder mal gesehen haben der es nicht kennt. Sogar FKK kann hier gemacht werden auf ausgewiesenen Bereichen. War ein Erlebnis und Erholung.

title: Nice walk but nothing unique
text: It was a nice day and a beautiful park, so if have time for a casual stroll on a nice day it would be worth some time, but if on limited time with so many sights to see I would not put it on top of my listOf must do things to do.

title: Huge garden to explore and chill out
text: This garden is bigger than Central Park or Hyde park! And has a surfing spot in it... yep; you read that right. Loads of waterways and grass to hang out on. Must visit when in Munich!

title: Naturskön park med stora möjligheter
text: Här kan man med fördel både vandra och cykla kilometervis, Det finns massor med stigar och vägar i det gröna. Man kan även sola och bada på många platser. I området finns ett flertal utmärkta restaurangen samt öl och matställen.
visit: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

title: פארק מקסים וגדול
text: אין ספק ששווה לבקר אינגליש בפארק. לבוא עם מגבת לספר, או לחרוש את כולו עם אופניים, בכל מקרה, הנאה מובטחת.
visit: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

title: Lovely gardens and landscape
text: Very nice landscape gardens and park. Has a lovely river/stream running through the middle and wide spaces around. Need to be a bit aware of your surrounding on a warm sunny day as many nude bathers around.

title: Exceeded Expecations
text: We wanted to stop at the English Gardens on our first day in Munich to relax and get some grounding in after a long flight. It was a great decision. We stayed for about an hour but could have spent an entire day there just taking it all in and exploring. We got some yummy gelato to top off a perfect stop.

title: L'endroit où apprécier les Biergartens!
text: Profitez d'une belle journée pour marcher le parc et vous hydrater dans une de ses agréables Biergarten, un incontournable!

title: Fantastisch park
text: Heb hier met mijn vriendin aan het water gelegen. Het was die dag 35 graden en zo'n beetje de halve stad leek hier wel ergens bij of in het water te liggen. Het park is echter zo groot dat er altijd wel ergens een rustig plekje te vinden is. Het OV is zo goed geregeld dat je vanuit hier makkelijk door kunt naar andere delen van het centrum. Naast het feit dat dit een rustige plek is om op je gemak doorheen te lopen is het ook erg mooi ingericht. Zeker de moeite waard.

title: HUGE oasis
text: Great place to relax and reload before throwing yourself again into the City life. Don’t forget to watch the surfers in the Eisbach!

title: English Gardens
text: A short walk from city to outdoors, literally. Great hiking experience with many fine details and beautiful spots to escape city chaos.

title: Beautiful Park
text: Beautiful Park, bigger than central park and running from central Munich Northwards. Well worth a visit, a lovely place with lots to do and see including a beer garden and very popular with locals which is amazing.

title: lovely nature
text: one of the best natural garden with lakes and river, birds, forests , sprawling green gardens , jogging track, lovely place to visit again and again to see the beauty of nature

title: Beautiful and large park
text: Relaxing walk through the park, was great as weather was good. Very large park and a few more signposts for areas would be good such as where the Japanese gardens are.

title: Facettenreicher Park mit allen Möglichkeiten
text: Zum Joggen, Fahrrad fahren und Spazierengehen geeignet. Es gibt viele Spielplätze, Biergärten und anderes

title: Όαση δροσιάς το καλοκαίρι
text: Ενδείκνυται για μεγάλες βόλτες κάτω από δέντρα και μέσα στο πράσινο. Επειδή είναι πολύ μεγάλος το καλύτερο είναι να νοικιάσετε ποδήλατα, ώστε να μπορέσετε να δείτε ένα μεγάλο μέρος του.  Σε μία είσοδό του κάνουν σερφ, ενώ υπάρχει και μία λίμνη, όμως δεν είναι και πολύ καθαρή. Υπάρχουν biergarten, όπου μπορείτε να φάτε και να ξεκουραστείτε.

title: Für jeden etwas dabei
text: Ob Ruhe und Entspannung oder ausgelassen Ballspielen, Sonnenbaden oder im Biergarten mit Freunden verweilen. Der Englische Garten ist ein Stück gelebte Münchner Tradition mit viel Zeitgeist und dies zu jeder Jahreszeit.

title: Ein himmlischer Ort zum Verweilen
