text: München mit seinen Stadtparks und vor allem dem englischen Garten ist auf jedenfall ein Besuch wert. Der englische Garten hat viele Wege zum Spazierengehen, tolle Wiesen die zum Sonnenbaden einladen und einen Kühlen Bach, der die gewisse Abkühlung zu heißen Sommertagen bringt.

title: I never want to leave!
text: We knew we had to go here during our trip. Once we arrived, we went straight for the food and beer, of course. 5 hours later, we realized we could probably stay here forever. The beer garden is the perfect place for a relaxing afternoon.

title: Englischer Garten mit viel Flair und Charme
text: Der englische Garten ist die grüne Lunge von München und einer der größten Parks der Welt! Die Wellenreiter des Eisbachs sind Weltbekannt, die Biergärten wie Chinesischer Turm und Seehaus ein muss für Fremde! Der Münchner geht aber lieber in die beiden kleineren Biergärten im Norden des Englischen Garten! Es gibt hier viel zusehen und zu erleben! Freizeit, Spazierengehen, Kutschenfahrten, mit dem Segway fahren! Hier ist für jeden etwas dabei!

title: Oasi in città
text: Parco immenso, pulitissimo, pieno di gente ma tranquillo, ideale per relax stragisti sul prato o passeggiando.Essendo a Monaco non può mancare il posto per una birra HB.E puoi fare surf.
visit: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

title: Herrliches Erholungsgebiet
text: Dieser riesige Garten mit See- Cafés und Biergarten- ein Spazier- und Erholungstreffpunkt mitten in der Stadt!  Herrlich diese Anlage!

title: Expansive Park in the heart of Munich
text: A truly beautiful park that adds loads of value to the city of Munich. Few cities have such a large and accommodating green space. Great place to go for a half-hour walk or spend an entire Sunday, swimming, lounging and playing sports. The people of Munich really value and make use of this awesome space.

title: Surf's up!
text: Yes, a beautiful, huge and peaceful park.  But with two (2) surfing spots on the river flowing through it!  Very busy beer garden at the Chinese Tower, with fun food and beer!

title: Wunderbares Naherholungsgebiet
text: Ich liebe die grüne Lunge der Stadt, vor allem da diese zu Fuß erreichbar ist! Die Biergärten Chinesischer Turm und das Seehaus sind wunderbar für ein Bier! Eine Bootsfahrt auf dem See ermöglicht Abstand vom Trubel zu gewinnen.

title: Lush day!
text: We hired donkey bikes and pootled around the park for a very pleasant morning. We had a giant pretzel at one of the beer gardens and paddled in the river; we watched some surfers surfing a river wave and listened to some oompah music at the Chinese pagoda! Some naked sunbathers provided amusement to very British girls and all in all it’s a lovely day out!

title: Natureza e contemplação Vá de Bike Viu!!!
text: Super lugar!! muito grande o ideal e explorar de bike tem muitos hotspots como: Onda que os locais surfam, praia de nudismo, construção estilo chines com restaurante top, feira de comidas, barragens e várias obras de artes espalhadas, com certeza vale a visita, mas vá de bike!!!

title: Great public park.
text: The pagoda in the middle with the beer garden was awesome and food was fantastic.  It was still open in March - it was chilly but still comfortable.  Friendly people and clean space.Travel date below says September 2018 only because i was unable to choose March 2018.

title: Роскошный парк
text: Приятно гулять, бегать, заниматься спортом. Есть пивные рестораны, много народу. Люблю это место, отдыхая душой.
visit: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

title: Bello...nonostante il gelo
text: La stagione non era l’ideale per girare per parchi: erano i primi di gennaio, tirava un vento polare, si respirava appena. Tuttavia ci ha colpito piacevolmente per la cura d’insieme, la pulizia dei vialetti, gli alberi immensi e alcuni scorci fotogenici. Sicuramente da rivedere con il bel tempo...
visit: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

title: Eine grüne Oase
text: In Hamburg ist das Gras durch die warmen Temperaturen schon gelb und abgebrannt und im Englischen Garten. Jogger, Hundebesitzer, Spaziergänger.. mega schön grün und gute Luft.

title: Jardín inglés (super recomendado)
text: Maravilloso parque, con vistas espectaculares merece la pena verlo y pasear en bicicleta, a nosotros nos cogió un poco la calor ero disfrutamos mucho del día.

title: Beautiful
text: Rented a bike and cycled around. Beautiful gardens, lots of things to do, very large in sizes and lots of people swimming in the cool rivers.
visit: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

title: Beautiful Park with a great beer garden in the middle.
text: We were lucky enough to wander through the English Garden on a gorgeous August day. It's a beautiful, English style park - informal grass and trees with numerous winding paths. There's relief from the summer heat in the middle with a cool, shady beer garden and it's a highlight on a summer evening to watch the surfers at the southern end!

title: Muito bonito!
text: Parque bastante grande, com muitos lugares pra sentar.O Rio Izar passa por ele, Rio super limpo...Recomendo para um passeio de 1/2 dia.

title: Walk or Swim
text: I took a walk and if you don't remember the path you took, you can exist from a total different end. The garden is so beautiful full of long trees, grass and 2 rivers. Some locals where just relaxed on the grass and enjoying the sun and others having a bath in the river.

title: Great place to walk
text: The English Garden was about 20 minute walk from our hotel.  It is large, very well kept and easily accessible.  Navigation maps were available at convenient locations.  The river surfing area is something to see - it is a novelty for a land locked city.
visit: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

title: Relax, che spettacolo
text: Il cuore verde di Monaco, pieno di gente, in mezzo alla città, facilmente raggiungibile con la metro (linea U3). Raccomandato per ritrovare la pace, in una città comunque accogliente come quella bavarese.

title: Beau jardin très fréquenté
text: Un très grand parc très fréquenté avec l'isar qui la traverse et dans laquelle tout le monde se baigne (même si elle est gelée) regarder les plans à l'entrée si vous voulez trouver les biergarten le parc est tellement grand ! Les locaux descendent la rivière et remonte à pied nus et trempés pour récupérer leurs vêtements

title: Estupendo espacio al aire libre en el centro de Múnich
text: Un gran oasis en el centro de Munich. Estupendo para los días de verano, con un canal donde poder bañarte e incluso hacer surf.
visit: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

title: Sydende fin - legeplads dårlig
text: Vi besøgte legepladsen oppe ved søen/Schwabing. Den var ikke turen værd. Vi tog en fin sejltur i søen. En anden dag besøgte vi syd-enden, hvor de surfer, det var sjovt at se, der er meget smukt, og der er en glimrende mad-/is-bod. NB: Man kan åbenbart selv hoppe i på en varm dag, og lade sig glide med, så husk badebukser.

title: Vacker och stor stadspark
text: Fin stadspark! Värt ett besök, man kan spendera mycket tid där och promenera omkring i de fina omgivningarna. Särskilt kul att se folk som surfade i parken.

title: Nice walk
text: This is a very nice place to spend few hours. It is worth to visit in summer time when people are gerenally enjoying good weather

title: Ontbijt in het park
text: Mooi park. Wat lekkers bij de bakker en winkel om de hoek gehaald en dan gezellig opgegeten in het parķ.Grote grasvelden en erg natuurlijk park

title: *** Einfach Toll ***
text: Wir haben den ganzen Tag im Englischen Garten verbracht. Wunderschöne Biergärten und herrlich zum spazieren gehen. Die Eisbach mit den Surfern sowie Strömungsschwimmern ist sehenswert. Der Biergarten am chinesischen Turm oder auch der Biergarten am See.
visit: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

title: Escapada ideal dentro de la ciudad
text: Complemento perfecto a la visita del casco histórico de Múnich. Donde pasar un rato agradable tanto si vas en familia como en pareja o amigos. Encontrarás multitud de personas disfrutando de la naturaleza, ya sea circulando en bicicleta, haciendo ejercicio, practicando surf en los rápidos del río o tomando algo en alguna de sus terrazas (Biergarten). Es una visita imprescindible.

title: Great way to spend a day
text: We spent half a day riding bikes around the park and stopped for lunch at the Chinese Beer Garden. The park is beautiful and huge. You could easily spend a day roaming around, having lunch, and watching the surfers on your way out.

title: Oase in drukke stad.
text: Prachtig park in het centrum van de stad. heerlijk om te wandelen of te fietsen (zelf om te zwemmen). Must see!

title: Agradable y amplio
text: Nos encantó pasear por el jardín y localizar sus puntos de interés, desde la ola que surfean en el río hasta una pagoda de 5 plantas. Recomendable con buen tiempo solo, incluso para hacer un picnic o tomar el sol en un descanso

title: aire limpio
text: Con buen tiempo es ideal para dar un paseo, comer un picnic o simplemente disfrutar del aire limpio. Se trata de unos amplísimos jardines, zonas arboladas y un río con patitos. Precioso de verdad! Merece l pena verlo
visit: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

title: SENCILLAMENTE ESPLENDIDO
text: Un enorme jardin de estilo inglés con Biergarten,canales,riachuelos,belvederes,caminos para circular  a pie o en bicicleta,incluso surfing en pleno canal del parque.Recomendable dedicaarle  un buen tiempo y sobre todo si hace buen dia

title: Mutluluk verici
text: Başınızdan böyle yağmur yağarken nasıl mutlu olursunuz. Buraya gidin anlarsınız. Çok güzel bir yer. Yeşile, huzura doyulan bir yer. Ne zaman gitsem her zaman mutluyum.

title: Awesome lush green haven in the middle of the city
text: We were completely bowled over by this lush green spot smack in the middle of Munich. Actually an entire day is required to do full justice to this amazing place. We were not prepared for such a vast expanse of green and therefore had to do a quick run of the place. The garden has it's own river, Eisbach, 2km long, which is man made. Being a really hot day we could see quite a few swimmers merrily floating past. There's even a delightful surfing spot where many surfers could be seen eagerly awaiting their turn. The place has nearly 80 km of walkways and a lake too. The beer garden (within the English garden) with a seating capacity of 7000 is another must visit spot for a 1ltr special mug. One can also try the three wheeler rickshaw ride in the garden if you would rather prefer a laid back look around. I could go on and on. But let me wind up by saying that it took me completely by surprise as it's a totally 'wow' place. If you're on holiday in Munich, especially first time, make sure you do not miss this 'must visit' spot.Cheers,Raghu & Deepa
visit: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

title: Beautiful Garden in the middle of Munich - and great beer garden
text: We cycled through the beautiful gardens - very cycle friendly and easy to navigate.  The two surfing waves were fun to watch.  Beer garden in the centre is really well set out and food was fantastic.  Wonderful atmosphere too!  Highly recommend visiting.

title: Magnifique !
text: Le plus grand parc du monde à l'intérieur d'une ville ( 5km sur 1 km), plus grand que central park .Magnifiquement arboré , très propre et soigné,  véritable parc que s'approprient les Munichois pour des promenades,  baignades etc...Location de vélos sur place Allez absolument au Biergarten à côté du pavillon chinois !

title: Very large park with lots of large shade trees
text: We spent several hours walking around a good portion of this very large park.  Lots of walking paths, birds, trees, peddleboats for rental and a few food places to eat.  Great to just enjoy some nature and walking.  Wear some comfortable shoes and be prepared to walk as there is a lot of it to see and numerous different paths to see it from.

title: Best park
text: Loved this place too much. It was a boiling hot day and we enjoyed a nice walk up to the beer garden. Good value for money. Enjoyed a litre Stein of beer each and Bratwurst sausages. Took a nice walk back along the river. There is a nudist bit we walked into by mistake but its no dramas. Its how the Germans role.
visit: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

title: The best spot for a hot day
text: If you like parks, if you like beer, and if you like to swim, this is your place to be. Unless the weather is foul. Take a stroll, sit on the grass or watch the surfers practise by the Haus der Kunst. But the best thing to do is taking a bath in the channel, allowing the current to take you down. Don't forget to stop in the beer garden for a meal and refreshment in the shape of a Maß, a 1 litre beer. Prices can scare you, but the place is super cool! Probably the best thing to do in Munich, bar the cultural and historical entertainment.

title: פארק מהיפים באירופה
text: הפארק במינכן מקסים ביופיו, נקי ומטופח באופן מעורר הערצה, רחב ידיים ובעיקר עצום בגודלו.לאורך הפארק זורם נחל קסום. בתחילתו אטקרציה נפלאה של גולשי גלים מקצוענים שגולשים על שפך הנהר (הנוער היה מהופנט).. בהמשך בריכות קטנות ופלגים עדינים שביום חם ניתן לרחוץ בהם. המים צלולים וקרים.באמצע הגן יש בית קפה וגן בירה מתוקתקים ושמחים. יש שירותים נקיים ומסודרים.חזרנו פעמיים באותו ביקור. מומלץ!

title: Enjoyed here
text: Spending time here with my friends was best experience, i really liked this place. Even though there was so many people, It is always everywhere but i would say it is very good place..

title: Massive beautiful park
text: This is by far the biggest park I've ever seen.  But my husband and I had nothing planned for the day so we enjoyed spending the day walking around.  It is beautifully maintained and very clean.  There are lots of wide open spaces to picnic or throw frisbees, and a beautiful river that flows through the park.  If you know where the river is, it can help you from getting lost!  We walked to the Chinese Tower Beer Garden (which was quite a ways in) and ate some super-delicious potatoes. We did see some naked men sunbathing but they were way off the path so it wasn't like you had to walk right by them.  At the beginning of the river, there are a group of surfers and that was fun to watch for a little bit. It was a fun and relaxing day in the English Garden.
visit: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

title: Great space, good vibes
text: The best location to meet with friends in the city centre. Bring a picnic and if you need some refreshment, dip into the river or grab a bier from the Chinesischer Turm Biergarten.

title: Masive park
text: The park was quite good maintained for its size. It has plenty of room for seating on the grass and enjoying an afternoon.

title: Garden party
text: Regarded as one of Munich's must-see stops, I'll admit the Englischer Garten wasn't actually all that high on my priority list. I'm not the most 'at one' with nature, but still felt I had to at very least take a look at this lush area of greenery in the heart of a very modern city, so early one morning off I set. The gardens are fairly sizable, and while for the most part it is grassy plains, there are also plenty of trees as well as numerous small ponds and streams, which ensure it has a large collective of birds running wild to admire. The remarkably large expanse the gardens cover, coupled with my early morning timeframe for visit meant it was a favourite with dog walkers, but I can imagine on a sunny day it will attract more than its fair share of families and picnics. On top of this, the garden does boast more than natural beauty, of which make no mistake it has plenty. Scattered throughout are a variety of minor attractions ranging from a greek style pantheon style monument to the more famous Japanese pagoda, which boasts a small beer garden which infuriatingly I was too early to take advantage of. Likewise there was nobody taking advantage of the artificial wave created with is a popular inner-city surfing spot. Overall, I'd say I enjoyed my jaunt through the Englischer Garten. Yes it isn't my normal cup of tea, but for an early morning stroll it cleared the cobwebs nicely, and for those more in tune with nature it is genuinely lovely. I imagine visiting in the afternoon would be better to be able to take in a beer, but at the same time have my reservations about how busy it would be. In short, I'd recommend taking a stroll through it if you find yourself in Munich, its free and hard to find fault in, it just isnt' necessarily my type of thing.

title: It's Huge
text: This is a  really very large park; a famous and popular green space in Munich. It has walking/ activity pathways. Some ponds and streams. A man made river with rough water where some daring individuals try to surf the waves. Some beer gardens. People picnicking, families playing games. A nice change from museums, shopping and buildings. Worth a walk through but do not expect to get through the whole park in a day. If you have time, check out the beer gardens.
visit: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

title: Too Big. A Park to Get Lost and Waste Time in.....
text: I've been to Munich twice and both times I tried taking walks in the "English Garden" park... It is of course lovely and much to see, but it's much bigger than you think. Both times I've been there I've gotten completely lost. The problem is that it all looks the same and there are many paths going in all directions. Locals seem to know what they're doing and where they're going but visitors have no business being here.Next time I go to Munich I will stay far away from the English Garden.....

title: Fantastic
text: We walked through the park to appreciate lovely ducks, the tufted duck, as well as the Bar Goose. Flowers, the view and surfers are everywhere. We enjoyed the birds and ice cream at the place, as well as the bike tour with a helpful guide. We took a lot of amazing photos there
visit: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

title: Hayran kalacaksınız
text: Sanırım en sevdiğim yer oldu ❤️ okadar büyük ve yemyeşil ki sizide kendine hayran bırakacak. Yemyeşil kocaman ağaçlarla çevrili ve çimlerin üzerinde güneşlenebilir, piknik yapabilirsiniz. Tam girişte sörf yapanları izleyebilirsiniz çok keyifli. Bizim gibi sıcaklığın uygun olduğu tarihte girerseniz nehre bile atlayabilirsiniz eşsiz bir tecrübeydi. Ama ayaklarınızı yukarı kaldırmayı unutmayın çünkü güçlü akıntı sizi götürecek ve ağlara takılana kadar korkmayın :) yine içeride 2 cafe gördük daha fazla var mı bilmiyorum. Domates çorbası çok güzeldi tavsiye ederim sanırım makarna da güzeldi çünkü çok kişi yiyordu. Fiyatlar münih de biraz yüksek ama porsiyonlar büyük :) o yüzden bir tabağı iki kişi paylaşabilirsiniz. Yine dondurma satan bir tezgahtan dondurmamızı da yedik. İsterseniz evinizde hazırladığınız yiyeceklerinizi çimlerde oturarak yeyip piknik yapabilirsiniz. Havası temiz sakin ve gerçekten çok eğlenceli bir yer. Tüm bunlar için 1 gününüzü ayırın derim.

title: Υπέροχο!
text: Πανέμορφο πάρκο, τόσο μεγάλο σε έκταση, βλέπεις παντού κόσμο να το απολαμβάνει.Θα δεις σέρφερ να κάνουν με τις σανίδες του, που μαζεύει γύρω τους πολύ κόσμο, είτε χειμώνα είτε είναι καλοκαίρι κάνουν σέρφινγκ.πραγματικά σε χαλαρώσει αυτό το πάρκο, Και αξίζει άμα βρεθείς Μόναχο να το επισκεφτείς!!

title: Lovely Park
text: This is a beautiful park in Munich city center. There is a an area where people can surf, there’s a lake you can rent paddle boats, there’s a Beer Garten and food area. We walked through the park which is vary large. Wear comfortable shoes.
visit: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

title: Роскошные ландшафты и пивной угар!)
text: Несомненно Английский сад Мюнхена следует отнести к шедеврам мировой ландшафтной культуры. Здесь можно гулять неспешно, а можно устроиться на пледе по примеру сотен немецких семей и пикник будет незабываемым, можно нанять велогида и за счет чужой мускульной силы минут за тридцать осмотреть все достопримечательности и окунуться в историю королевских дворов Европы...Но можно и оторваться в пивном угаре с парой тысяч собутыльников, говорящих на всех языках мира, заполняющих ежедневно целую площадь на окраине сада. Выбирайте сами! Говорят, что есть те, кто пытался сочетать наслаждение парком и наслаждение пенным напитком, но не уверен, что это у них получилось удачно))) Поэтому, выбирайте!

title: Calmness
text: Gorgeous park in the heart of Munich. Big enough for a long walk or jog, or just to look around and sit on the grass. Peaceful, despite sometimes busy.
visit: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

title: Great getaway
text: Big, very big parc northwest of the altstadt. Great to walk or cycle around and maybe take a swim in the currents of the Eisenbach. Different beergardens to have a drink or bite. Lots of places to just put down a towel and watch all the people.
visit: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

title: Vita da monacense
text: Posto molto bello da visitare SOLO di giorno. Di notte pericolosissimo ! Portatevi un costume ed un asciugamano per farvi trasportare dai vari corsi d’acqua che passano attraverso il parco. Ottimo anche il Biergarten interno. Giornata di completo relax.

title: Bring your togs!
text: Go on , go on! Join in...Walk, scoot, cycle around this fantastic garden. Have a dip and cool float  down the river, a bit sore on the feet with the pebbles but a great experience. View the dare devil surfers .... a class act. Bring a picnic and beer, a must do on a hot day in Munich or any day. U ban.. university stop. Enjoy....

title: Supertoll
text: Sehr abwechslungsreich und für jeden das richtige Plätzchen. Kinder waren mit den Füßen etwas im schattigen Bach und hatten someone tolle Abkühlung am heißesten Tag des Jahres...

title: Sorprendente
text: Io e i miei amici siamo rimasti molto sorpresi da questo parco: non solo è un bellissimo parco per rilassarsi, prendere il sole, mangiare o fare passeggiate, ma offre anche la possibilità di fare bagni con correnti e rapide molto divertenti(oltre la possibilità, per chi ne è capace, di fare surf)!! Perciò portatevi assolutamente un costume da bagno per non perdervi questa esperienza e preparatevi a divertirvi con i vostri amici. Purtroppo non abbiamo girato tutto il parco, ma quello che abbiamo visto ci è bastato: è la cosa più bella di Monaco..dopo la birra!!

title: A must visit when in Munich
text: The English Gardens is one of the highly recommended places when visiting Munich. It is a large green region in between the city where the river flows across the garden. It has got an immense amount of greenery and has many activities like surfing etc. The bridges that stand over the flowing river are very scenic and beautiful. The views are simply majestic and peaceful. A must visit.

title: Check out the Surfing!
text: A really lovely park in Munich with well planned but natural looking waterways and gardens. Spacious so that you feel relaxed even on a busy, nice day. Full of ducks and geese. Big grassy areas to have picnics and play games. Would highly recommend on a nice day in Munich.Be sure to check out one of the spillways where you can catch surfers practicing their moves!
visit: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

title: Great place when the temperature rises
text: Despite the signs saying swimming is forbidden there were still plenty of people in the water. Mind you the 30+ degrees probably helped. Beautiful open space for all to enjoy. Make sure you catch some of the surfing on the wave they have created. Very cool.

title: Enorm park med surfmöjligheter
text: Gillar man promenera runt är Engelska parken ett måste när man besöker München. Det finns även möjlighet att surfa i deras kanal, häftigt. En stor uteservering finns med klassisk tysk mat och dryck, vissa dagar spelas även tyrolermusik i kinesiska tornet :-)

title: Great place for walking
text: This is a great place for walking! It has a very big open space with lots of trees. A river flowing across the area gives it a peaceful and refreshing feel.
visit: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

title: Park
text: Härlig park för picknick och bad. Vi gick en runda och kom till kinesiska tornet. Finns lite serveringar men annars verkar det vara en oas för Münchenbor.

title: Excelente opción para actividades al aire libre
text: Visité Múnich cuando estaba la ola de calor en Europa. El río del Jardín inglés es ideal para estas temperaturas: super refrescante. Eso sí, en verano suele llenarse de gente.

title: Nice gardens, next time in London ...
text: Nice gardens for a quiet and pleasant stay when the weather allows it, but not the gardens of London ...
visit: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

title: Magnifique
text: Je vous conseille de louer des vélos pour le parcourir en entier. Il y a un magnifique lac au milieu et une zone Nord plus sauvage, mais magnifique.
visit: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

title: Need comfortable shoes and bathing suit!
text: Swimming and surfing are technically prohibited however you will find plenty of people floating down the river and surfing in one spot where there is a constant wave. If you dont want to take the ride down the river and walk back to your stuff (the current moves pretty fast!) then simply select a calmer part of the river to dip your feet in. The park is huge with ponds w ducks and a huge courtyard where people sunbathers and play sports. The other amazing part about the park is the Chinese beer garden!
visit: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

title: 수영복 챙기세여
text: 여러분 수영 꿀잼이에요. 다만 물살이 쎄니까 낮은 풀에서 흘러가세요. 쎈곳으로 간다면 가다가 옆으로 세서 어디든 잡고 올라가세요... 물은 160인 저에겐 발이 닿았고 어깨밑까지 와요.

title: The place is massive!
text: What a park!! Beautiful, clean, no trouble-makers and it contains a massive beergarden with another smaller but more scenic one by the lake.
visit: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

title: This place is great
text: We walked from the south entrance all the way to about the middle at Seehauz Biergarten. The surfing was so much fun to watch, but I wished I had brought a swim suit, because I would have been jumping in the river with everyone else. I can see why the locals love it.
visit: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

title: A jewel in the middle of Munich
text: This park is huge- and we only explored half of it.  It’s very walkable, both with shade and sun, and the people watching is infinite.  Streams so clear you can see to the bottom, and many people were wading and swimming in them.  Space to run and play soccer.  Just a great place to get to know Bavarians.
visit: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

title: De kapel in de tuin
text: Prachtige kapel met in het midden een vleugel. Een jonge pianist speelde klassiek met jazzy invloeden. Dit is waarom je naar München zou kunnen gaan. Heerlijk.
visit: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

title: Munich's local hotspot
text: We entered the English Garden and decided to dip our feet in the water since it was such a hot day.  Nearby there were office workers enjoying their lunches.  Five hundred meters later, we saw people swimming, floating, doing the cannon ball, and swinging on a rope before jumping in the river. On both shores there were people sunbathing (at least one topless), playing soccer, and picnicking.  Another 100 meters further, there is a small area where numerous surfers wait in line for a chance to ride a wave.  Farther along the river, we came to the Chinese and Beer Gardens.  Our daughters convinced us to go directly to shop for swim suits so that we can return tomorrow and join in the fun. Even in our long walk, we were not even one fourth of the way through the park.

title: El pulmón de Munich.
text: El jardín inglés es un precioso parque para relajarse y dar un agradable paseo en un día soleado. Es muy verde y lo cruza un bonito río. La única pega, si es que tiene alguna, es que al ser enorme, si no te fijas bien puedes perderte y a nosotros nos pasó, pero vale la pena visitarlo.
visit: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

title: Impresionante
text: Es el parque más bonito que he visto jamas. Lugar de visita obligada sin duda alguna. Solo hace falta buen tiempo para disfrutarlo

title: Bello e sicuro
text: Un parco dai contenuti storici importanti che anche di notte è tranquillo. Siamo stati durante una manifestazione estiva (TOOLWOOD SUMMER). Molto bello.
visit: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

title: Best gardens
text: Very nice gardens, impressive with different kind of places inside, great playground for children and great place to rest
